Ce site présente les principales missions de l'association les APSYADES et s'adresse à une cible très diversifiée allant de l'ensemble des professionnels de santé au niveau local et national, les usagers du système de santé,ou toutes personnes désireuses de s'informer sur les problématiques addictives et psychiatriques. Il est composé de manière à présenter sur chaque page l'activité addictologie ou psychiatrie puis de reprendre les différentes modalités de prises en charge ambulatoire ou en hospitalisation. Une identification des lieux de soins est également prévue afin de permettre aux visiteurs de situer plus précisément l'activité notamment en vu d'un éventuel rendez-vous.

This website provides information about the association, and about psychiatry and addictology.

name: Fondation du Souffle
description: Ce site est destiné aux patients, au grand public et aux  professionnels de santé. Son rôle principal est d'informer  et de prévenir des dangers des maladies respiratoires.

name: European LeukemiaNet
description: The objective is to integrate the 78 leading leukemia trial groups (chronic myeloid leukemia (CML), acute myeloid leukemia (AML), acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL), chronic lymphoid leukemia (CLL), myelodysplastic syndromes (MDS), chronic myeloproliferative disorders (CMPD)), their 83 interdisciplinary partner groups (diagnostics, treatment research, registry, guidelines), industry and SMEs across Europe to form a cooperative network for advancements in leukemia-related research and health care.

name: HIL - Health Information Library
description: This site provides direct links to health information on various health conditions and various specialities from different good quality websites. It also provides local & National Support Group information and information leaflets in different languages and useful websites.

name: The Life Raft Group
description: Life Raft Group is a non-profit organization providing support, through  information, education, and innovative research to patients with a rare  cancer called GIST (Gastrointestinal Stromal Tumor).

name: Ligue vaudoise contre le rhumatisme
description:
Le site présente 'la Ligue vaudoise contre le rhumatisme ' il propose des informations sur les prestations et de la documentation sur les pathologies rhumatismales; des cours et l'accès au journal ForumR aux membres affiliés. Des vacances pour rhumatisants.

The site presents ' the League of Vaud against rheumatism ' he proposes information on its services and documentation on rheumatic pathologies; courses and access to the Forum newspaper with the affiliated members, as well as holidays for rheumatics.

name: Ligues de la santé
description: Le site présente l'association les Ligues de la santé,  laquelle est un organisme de prévention et promotion de la  santé du canton de Vaud.

name: Lilly-Pharma
description: This site provides the public with information on disease states like Schizophrenia, Depression, Cancer, Diabetes, Osteoporosis, ADHD, Stress Urinary Incontinence, Erectile Dysfunction. In a protected area for Health Care Professionals it informs about Lilly products. It also provides services for all target groups like downloading of brochures, online requests to Lilly, ordering of information material etc.

name: Raríssimas -  Associação Nacional de Deficiências Mentais e Raras
description:
This website is promoted by the Raríssimas, the Portuguese National Rare Diseases Association. Linha Rara is the Help Line of this non profit organization and its website displays information on rare diseases and related issues (such as orphan drugs, and patient's rights).

Este website é desenvolvido pela Associação Portuguesa de Doenças Raras - 'Raríssimas'. Linha rara é uma linha de ajuda desta Associação e este website disponibiliza informação sobre doenças raras e assuntos relacionados como Medicamentos Orfãos e direitos dos Doentes.

name: Live Interventional Neuroradiology and Neurosurgery Course (LINNC online)
description: LINNC online (Live Interventional Neuroradiology and Neurosurgery Course) is an online reference source for the entire Interventional NeuroRadiology and NeuroSurgery community. It provides authoritative and robust educational content delivered in an innovative and dynamic format to the thousands of online members.

name: linuspediatric
description: Este sitio proporciona información adicional para los  padres y contiene, exclusivamente artículos científicos,  con referencias bibliográficas originales.

name: Nicolas Litchman - Kinésithérapeute - Podologue du sport
description: Ce site a pour but d'informer les internautes sur le cabinet privé de  Nicolas Litchman, kinésithérapeute et pédicure-podologue.

name: Petite Victoire
description: Ce site représente une communauté d’entraide qui accompagne les  enfants à besoins particuliers et qui réunit tous ceux et celles qui  savent que la guerre se gagne une victoire à la fois.

name: London Paediatrician
description: This site provides information about the private practice of  Dr Andrew Sawczenko, Consultant paediatrician, including  clinic locations, times and professional fees.

name: The Lower Back Pain Toolkit
description: The site contains information on lower back anatomy, the causes of  lower back pain and evidence based treatment for low back pain.  Written by a physiotherapist the site encourages an active approach to  lower back pain.

name: Laboratoire de Recherche et d'analyses Médicales de la Fraternelle de la Gendarmerie Royale
description: Le site se veut être une interface interactive et perfectible entre les prestataires du LRAM (biologistes médicaux, docteurs ès-sciences ...) et les utilisateurs (patients, prescripteurs, chercheurs, doctorants...). L'objectif et les orientations s'articulent autour de 4 axes principaux : 1- Prestation de conseil 2- Information, formation et communication 3- Recueil des suggestions et réclamations 4- Recherche scientifique et partenariat

name: Luigi Basso
description: This site provides information and orientations to patients  regarding medical issues in the fields of coloproctology,  laparoscopic surgery and general surgery.

name: Lunge Zürich
description:
Lunge-zuerich.ch ist das Gesundheitsprotal von Lunge Zürich und richtet sich hauptsächlich an Lungenkranke, deren Angehörige und Bekannte, aber auch an Ärzte und weitere Medizinalpersonen. Ziel ist eine umfassende Information hinsichtlich gesundheitsfördernder und -schädigender Einflüsse sowie Beratungs- und Betreuungsangeboten.

This web site provides information on the Lung League of Zurich and its services. The web site also provides comprehensive health and medical information for patients and sufferers.

name: Lungeninformationsdienst München
description: Im Auftrag des neuen Deutschen Zentrums für Lungenforschung bietet der Lungeninformationsdienst München Patienten und der interessierten Öffentlichkeit Informationen zu Diagnostik, Therapie und Prävention von Lungenerkrankungen und stellt aktuelle Forschungsergebnisse vor. Zugleich bildet der Lungeninformationsdienst eine Plattform, auf der sich Patienten, Selbsthilfegruppen und Wissenschaftler austauschen  können.

name: Ligue vaudoise contre le cancer
description:
Le site présente la Ligue vaudoise contre le cancer, une association à but non lucratif, qui propose un soutien moral et pratique aux personnes atteintes par la maladie et à leurs proches. On y trouve des informations sur les prestations de l’association, sur la prévention, des brochures d’information sur la maladie, ainsi qu’un calendrier des activités proposées (manifestations, cours et ateliers).

The website presents La Ligue vaudoise contre le cancer, a non-profit association which proposes psychosocial and practical support to people affected by disease and their close relations. One can find informations on their services, on the prevention, brochures of informations about the disease as well as a calendar of the proposed activities (demonstrations, courses and workshops).

name: Dutch Lymphedema Network
description: The site provides information, guidelines and addresses for patients  as  healthcare workers as well. All information is evidence based and  expert based. There is a close cooperation with the Dutch working  group on lymphedema from the Dutch institute for healthcare  improvement CBO. The lymphedema network is an initiative from the  non-profit organisation 'Dutch Centre of Lymphology'. Besides this  internetplatform another major activity of the Dutch centre of  Lymphology is Education. Many courses are being organized for  doctors, therapists and other healthcare workers. Many official  comities  from physiotherapists, skin therapists, garment experts are  cooperating  in this Network. For example, constantly accurate addresslists will  be provided to all readers from the website. A very popular item on the  site is the forum which is used by many patients to get contact with  others. There are many scientific links and links to other  supportgroups  in the world. A webmaster is working 3 days a week for the website.  The FAQ's will be answered by the expert panel.

name: Lymph Notes
description: Lymph Notes offers information and support for people with  lymphedema, their family and friends, lymphedema  therapists, and people at risk for developing lymphedema.

name: Lynxcare
description: This site describes Lynx's services and products (acquiring and summarizing patient records; health system navigation and  advocacy; professionally created and certified Personal Health Records). It also provides information about managing personal health information,  obtaining consultation about complex health conditions, and links to media  about  the company.

name: Landeszentrum Gesundheit Nordrhein-Westfalen
description: Die Webseite des LZG.NRW bietet insbesondere Fachpublikum  wissenschaftsbasiertes Hintergrundwissen und praktische Hilfen für  den Alltag.  Themenbereiche sind unter anderem Versorgungsforschung, Gesundheitsprävention,  Berichte und Daten, Sozialpharmazie und Gesundheit am  Arbeitsplatz.

name: Rhinoplastie, Dr Allouche Spécialiste
description: Dr Allouche, chirurgien esthétique de la rhinoplastie, spécialiste en rhinoplastie, chirurgie esthétique du nez à Paris.

name: Maladies Auto Immunes et Thérapie Cellulaire
description: Le site contribue au développement de l'utilisation de la greffe de moelle osseuse et de la thérapie cellulaire pour le traitement des maladies auto-immunes et auto-inflammatoires afin de promouvoir la place d'excellence de notre pays dans le contexte international à partir d'une recherche innovante, académique et hospitalière.

name: Mesothelioma and Asbestos Awareness Center
description: The Mesothelioma and Asbestos Awareness Center is an educational resource providing general medical information intended for those diagnosed with mesothelioma.

name: MAISON DE SOINS
description:
Le site contient toutes les informations utiles aux patients qui souhaitent consulter un professionnel de santé sur le territoire de santé qui le concerne. Le patient dispose en plus sur la page d'accueil des informations les plus récentes concernant la Maison de Soins / Maison de Santé : labéllisation, partenariat avec d'autres structures de santé (EHPAD, Hôpitaux), évolution de la médecine de proximité.

This site provides information about the Maison de soins.

name: Poradnik dla rodziców dzieci z malformacjami kapilarnymi
description:
Ta strona dostarcza informacje dla pacjentów z malformacjami kapilarnymi dotyczące laseroterapii oraz diagnostyki w kierunku zespołu Struge-Webera.

This site provides informations about laser treatment and Sturge-Weber Syndrome for patients with capillary malformations (Port-Wine Stains).

name: Malysham Info
description: This site provides information about pregnancy, delivery and child health.

name: Managing Myeloma
description: This site is an educational initiative dedicated to developing  tools, information, and resources that support improved  therapeutic outcomes for patients diagnosed with multiple  myeloma.

name: Ma Prévention Santé
description: Le site Ma Prévention Santé est un portail d’information ayant pour vocation d’apporter des réponses concrètes aux questions santé des internautes. Il aborde les préoccupations quotidiennes de toute la famille (alimentation, sommeil, médicaments, sevrage tabagique, etc.) et se démarque en se spécialisant sur les thématiques émergentes que sont la santé environnementale et la santé au travail. A l’origine de chaque article, une question que chacun peut être amené à se poser, concernant son alimentation, l'exposition aux polluants de l'environnement, le stress au travail, etc.  Les articles publiés sur Ma Prévention Santé sont validés par les professionnels de santé partenaires de La Mutuelle Familiale, éditrice du site.

name: http://www.mariegalene.org/
description: Ce présent site internet a pour objet de faire connaitre la Maison de  Santé Marie Galene mais aussi d'informer sur les activités de soins afin  de rendre plus visibles les prestations de soins proposées. Il s'agit offrir un portail d'informations mis à jour pour les Patients, leurs  familles mais aussi pour les Etablissements et Médecins adresseurs.

name: Aesthetic Plastic Surgeon: Mark Henley
description: This site provides information about a range of cosmetic procedures. It  provides guidance on the decision making process a person should  follow before committing to any type of cosmetic treatment or  procedure. This should assist individuals to choose the right provider of  care and make the right treatment choices.

name: Colon Retto Ano Pavimento pelvico Informazioni su diagnosi, malattie e terapie
description: L'idea di un portale dedicato alle malattie organiche e funzionali del  grosso intestino è nata dall'esigenza di informare il più ampio numero  di persone su patologie spesso poco conosciute e poco divulgate dai  media. La caratteristica del nostro sito sarà quella di mettere in  comune le esperienze di specialisti di diverse branche e offrire un  servizio di rapida informazione su tutte le novità più importanti del  settore. Lavoreremo insieme a chirurghi, gastroenterologi, radiologi,  endoscopisti, neurolgi, psicologi, oncologi, patologi ed altre figure  professionali selezionate di volta in volta per la particolare esperienza  dimostrata sia nella ricerca che nella clinica.

name: Maternité Port-Royal
description:
Le site de la Maternité Port-Royal s'adresse au grand public, professionnels de santé et étudiants. Il a pour but d'accompagner l'internaute visiteur dans sa recherche d'informations sur la maternité ainsi que de lui fournir des informations complémentaires à la consultation.

This website provides information about maternity.

name: Matterna | Birth Matters
description:
Website dedicated to promote women's health, namely during their reproductive years specialized, with a special focus in areas such as pregnancy, childbirth or breastfeeding.

Página web dedicada a promover la salud de la mujer especialmente durante su etapa reproductiva especializada en áreas como el embarazo, el parto o la lactancia.

name: Mayfield Clinic
description: This site provides neurosurgery information for patients and families, referring physicians, and the general public. The site includes patient education about disorders of the brain and spine and treatment options, physician biographies, appointment information, patient stories, links to government and educational sites, and news releases.

name: MayoClinic.com
description:
The Mayo Clinic Web site helps people manage illness and stay healthy through the wisdom of Mayo Clinic's physicians.
Tools help users understand their diagnosis, make treatment decisions and live better with chronic conditions. It gives trustworthy answers, puts daily medical news in perspective and helps people take charge of their health.

name: Michael Werner, MD - Private Practice
description: This site provides medical techniques for treatment of male and  female sexual dysfunction, infertility, male menopause, sperm  cryobanking and semen analysis  to enable men and women achieve  sexual health and satisfying male and female sexuality.

name: Cabinet dentaire du Dr Mazille-Rouel
description: Ce site contient des informations sur l'activité du cabinet  dentaire du Dr Mazille-Rouel, sur l'équipe qui y travaille, sur la  localisation du cabinet et la philosophie de la dentisterie qui y  est pratiquée. Il contient également des informations destinées  aux patients qui ont peur du dentiste et aux parents d'enfants  qui ont besoin de soins dentaires.

name: Interpersonal Communication And Relationship Enhancement (I*CARE)
description: This site is dedicated to improving the communication  among cancer patients, their families and their providers.  It contains materials designed to help learn how to manage difficult situations in ones practice and to teach these skills to others.

name: MD Anderson Cancer Center’s Integrative Medicine Education Resources
description: This site provide access to multiple databases of authoritative, up to date reviews on  the evidence and safety for the use of herbs, supplements, vitamins, and minerals, as  well as other complementary medicine modalities. This National Cancer Institute and  healthfinders approved site examines the overwhelming Complementary and  Integrative  Medicine (CIM) information to separate fact from fiction.

name: mdBriefCase Australia
description:
www.mdBriefCase.com.au is an Australian on-line, continuing professional development (CPD) provider.
The web site provides free multimedia, interactive and accredited learning programs. All programs are written by the specialists in their respective field and developed strictly according to RACGP/ACRRM guidelines.

name: mdBriefCase
description: This site provides free, accredited continuing medical education for physicians only. More than 30 courses are available in a wide range of topics suitable for family practitioners and specialists.

name: MDlatam
description: MDlatam nace de una iniciativa realizada por Javier Mancilla  en Chile para segmentar información de salud con un alto  nivel de usabilidad, diseño y relevancia. El objetivo  puntual es ser el mayor generador de contenidos de  Latinoamérica en temas de salud y vida sana.

name: mdPassport
description: Physicians need access to clear, concise and relevant  information they can trust. Following in the footsteps of its  parent company mdBriefCase, mdPassport promises to be  at the forefront of health research and pharmaceutical  arenas in order to keep you abreast of the current issues  which matter most to you.  We believe that there is great value in providing a single  site where a physician can participate in accredited,  unbiased CME activities, interact with their peers, stay  current with the latest health care news and improve their  understanding of medicine.

name: NCI Cancer.gov Database Main Index
description:
The National Cancer Institute web site is a comprehensive resource for the different type of cancer. Description and treatment for each cancer is available. Especially, the breast, brain, colon, endometrial, esophageal, gastric, leukemia, liver, lung, oropharyngeal, ovarian, pancreatic, prostate, skin, testicular, thyroid, and vaginal cancer.
This site is intended for individuals and special features are provided for medical professionals.

name: Sanoia
description: Le service internet Sanoia est développé par e-Health Services SAS et édité pour sa  version grand public par l'association AIMSU.   Sanoïa c’est une gamme de solutions e-santé à destination des patients, pour leur  Auto-suivi et leur participation à la Recherche.   La plateforme Sanoïa est anonyme. Aucun élément nominatif ou permettant de  reconnaître ses usagers en dehors de leur présence n’est demandé. Nous ne  collectons pas de nom, de pseudonyme, d’adresse e-mail ou de n° de téléphone.   Cette sécurité est encore renforcée par l’utilisation des services d’un hébergeur de  données de santé agréé qui conserve vos données avec les standards de sécurité  les plus élevés (toutes éditions). Enfin, Sanoïa a fait le choix de désigner un  Correspondant Informatique et Libertés (CIL). Ce dernier veille à notre conformité à  la loi « informatique et libertés », nous aide à protéger vos données et à anticiper les  questions liées au respect de votre vie privée (toutes éditions).

name: medac France, laboratoire de spécialités pharmaceutiques basé à Lyon
description: Ce site est un site non marchand qui a pour objectif de  faire une présentation institutionnelle des activités,  produits et services du laboratoire pharmaceutique  medac en France. Il est accessible gratuitement à tout  utilisateur disposant d'un accès à internet.

name: Meddispar - Ordre national des pharmaciens
description: le site www.meddispar.fr permet d'accéder facilement à toute information relative aux médicaments à dispensation particulière disponibles à l'officine, ce site d'accès libre pour tous, concentre en un seul lieu toute l'information réglementaire utile, relative à la prescription et à la dispensation à l'officine des médicaments concernés :     * les médicaments à prescription restreinte     * les médicaments d'exception     * les substances vénéneuses     * les médicaments dérivés du sang     * les médicaments délivrés à titre gratuit     * les médicaments en libre accès

name: Docteur Nicolas JOYARD Médecin Ostéopathe exclusif à Lyon depuis 1993
description: Ce site contient des informations pratiques (localisation, honoraires, agenda, contact) sur le fonctionnement du cabinet du Dr Nicolas JOYARD, médecin  diplômé en médecine manuelle - ostéopathie et en mésothérapie, ainsi que des explications sur sa  manière de travailler au travers de la description détaillée de la technique spécifique qu'il utilise : la méthode Pécunia.

name: Médecine Interne Hôpital Joseph Ducuing
description: Ce site contient les informations sur les coordonnées pour un avis  téléphonique ou organiser une consultation non programmée de  médecine interne. Il est donc destiné aux médecins. Il contient une page  d'information sur l'histoire de l'hôpital Joseph Ducuing, une page  concernant les diplomes des médecins internistes de l'hôpital Joseph  Ducuing, une page concernant le pôle Hépatite-VIH avec les noms et  fonctions des intervenants, et une page de présentation de l'éducation  thérapeutique

name: Médecine nucléaire de la Doua
description: La Médecine nucléaire de la Doua est équipés de matériel spécialisé  pour réaliser des examens de scintigraphie et PET SCAN.

name: MedEducation.Org
description: The site is summarizing the recent updates inthe filed of  infction control ,epidemiology , public health and try to  announce opportunities in those fileds and simplified some  tools to help professionals work in these fileds by know how  section  job opportunity is avilable for both job seakers and employers

name: Espace Ethique Méditerranéen
description:
Ce site contient des informations présentant l'espace éthique méditerranéen (EEM) et ses activités. Il liste aussi tous les événements traitant d'éthique médicale dans la région. D'autre part, ce site présente les enseignements dispensés à l'EEM ainsi que des textes traitant d'éthique médicale.

This site provides information about EEM.

name: MeDiCaLeSe
description: A place to look for new and elusive medical terms. By and for  working  medical transcriptionists.  High-speed searchable database,  updated  daily.

name: Medical Home Portal
description: The Medical Home Portal serves CSHCN by addressing the  information and  resource access needs of physicians, other healthcare  professionals,  educators, families and patients. The Portal currently (January  2012)  contains over 500 pages of content and resources, over 3600  links to other  reliable and valuable web sites or downloadable information, over  2200  citations of scientific and other expert literature to provide users  with the  evidence behind recommendations or to explore topics in greater  depth, and  information on more than 2400 local (Utah) services for CSHCN  and their  families.

name: PCRC - Concepts in Professional Education
description: This site is dedicated to providing educational resources for the aspiring  student or healthcare professional contemplating incorporating MIR into their clinical milieu.

name: Medical News Today
description: An internet publisher of medical and health news, providing  concise and accurate information that stands out in the ocean  of content that is health on the internet.

name: Medicinae Doctor
description: This site provides news about health and medical literature.

name: Solución a los problemas de origen prenatal
description: Este sitio provee información sobre las actividades del Grupo de Investigación en Medicina Fetal  y Perinatal del Hospital Clinic de Barcelona cuyo objetivo principal es buscar soluciones a las enfermedades de origen prenatal. También hay un apartado de  formación para profesionales vinculado al Hospital Clínic, uno de  los mayores de España.

name: Medicina Vascular intervencionismo mínimamente invasivo
description:
This website provides information on cardiac and peripheral minimally invasive interventions.

El sitio web proporciona información sobre intervencionismo cardíaco y periferico mínimamente invasivo

name: Onmeda: Medizin und Gesundheit
description:
Onmeda hat sich zum Ziel gesetzt, Patienten kompetent zu informieren. Auf der Seite werden Erkrankungen allgemein verständlich erklärt, Besucher erhalten Tipps zur gesunden Lebensweise, zur Ernährung und aktuelle Neuigkeiten aus der Welt der Medizin. Die unabhängige und zertifizierte Website geht über 600 Krankheitsbildern und 130 Symptomen auf den Grund, liefert Informationen rund um den Arztbesuch und gibt individuelle Antworten in mehr als 45 Foren, die überwiegend von medizinischen Experten betreut werden. Ratgeber, Selbsttests und Tools wie ein BMI-Rechner runden das Angebot ab.

This web site provides information on all aspects of medicine and health. This includes understandable and profond descriptions of many important diseases, the functioning of medical equipment, nutrition, sexuality, pregnancy and childbirth as well as a large historical section on the pioneers of medicine. The content extends over 4000 pages and all information is in German.

name: MedicineNet
description: This site provides proprietary, easy-to-read, in-depth medical and  health  information for consumers and is produced by board-certified  physician  writers and scientists.

name: medicines.ie
description: Medicines.ie is a source of information on medicinal products, with a powerful search facility, available in Ireland.  The information for each product comes in the form of a summary of product characteristics (SPC), and patient information leaflet (PIL) where relevant, which are approved by the regulatory authority as part of the process of authorising the product for sale or supply in Ireland. It contains a database of drugs and a database of pharmaceutical companies. A tool to report adverse reaction & quality defect is available.

name: Medico & Leggi
description:
Raccolta aggiornata di normativa sanitaria.

This site provides informations about Italian legislation concerning the activity of the medical doctor.

name: Medicol Centre de chirurgie orthopédique de Lausanne
description:
Ce site permet aux patients et professionnels de la santé d'obtenir de l'information dans le domaine de la médecine et de la chirurgie orthopédique conçu par le centre de hautes compétences en chirurgie orthopédique de Lausanne.

This website allows patients and health professionnals to get informations in the field of the medicine and of the orthopaedic surgery, conceived by the center of high skills in orthopaedic surgery of Lausanne.

name: Medikal
description: Le site contient un annuaire de recherche multicritère de  médecins en Suisse. Les médecins abonnés au service sont signalés dans la  liste de résultats de la recherche et permettent aux patients de fixer un rendez vous avec eux. Le site permet donc la gestion des rendez  vous médicaux (consultation) pour les médecins, patients et  secrétariats médicaux, ainsi que le rappel automatique des rendez vous par  mail et sms.

name: Médilab-GROUP
description: Ce site présente le  Laboratoire de Biologie Médicale (LBM) Médilab-GROUP : Laboratoire regroupant aujourd'hui 8 sites dans la partie Centre et Sud du département des Deux-Sèvres ce qui en fait un acteur important de l'offre sanitaire déployée dans ce territoire de santé. L'organisation mise en place répond à une double préoccupation : développer une biologie moderne utilisant des outils technologiques performants regroupés au sein d'un site de production principal nouvellement implanté à CHAURAY et être au plus près des patients et des prescripteurs grâce à un maillage géographique harmonieux de l'ensemble des sites ouverts au public.

name: Medindia  Health & Wellness News, Information
description: Medindia.net provides authentic, accurate, and authoritative health news, information and tools to consumers and healthcare professionals globally to allow them to better manage their health, provide better care to patients, and lead healthier and happier lives.

name: MEDINET.fr - Annonces médicales
description: Le site met à la disposition des professionnels de la santé un service  Internet pouvant recevoir des petites annonces médicales. Le site a  pour objectif de mettre en relation les professionnels de la santé. Les  annonces sont placées par les annonceurs dans des rubriques et  sous-rubriques spécifiques. Le but recherché est que l'annonceur  puisse recevoir le maximum de réponses à son annonce médicale. Le  site fonctionne 24 heures sur 24 et 7 jours sur 7. Il est libre d’accès.  En aucun cas, le site ne peut être qualifié d'intermédiaire et sa  responsabilité engagée qu'il y ait transaction ou pas. Le site n'est  jamais partie à l'accord qui est conclu entre ses membres.

name: Medinteract.net
description:
Este sitio provee información sobre interacciones farmacológicas basadas en la revisión de la evidencia científica, de todos los principios activos comercializados en España, incluidas plantas medicinales. A la interacción se puede acceder desde el principio activo como desde la marca comercial. Está dirigido a profesionales de la salud.

Website that provides large information about drug interactions, concerning all drugs commercialized in Spain. The search can be done either by active principle or by brand.

name: mediQ.ch- Risikobewusst kombinieren
description:
Dieses Interaktionsprogramm richtet sich an medizinische Fachpersonen und soll eine Hilfe darstellen, auf einfache und schnelle Weise nötige Informationen zu medikamentösen Kombinationstherapien einzuholen. Neben Informationen zu einzelnen Medikamenten, Nahrungs-, Genussmitteln und pharmakogenetischen Einflussfaktoren, bietet das mediQ-Interaktionsprogramm vor allem eine Risiko- Einschätzung für Medikamenten-Kombinationen

This interaction program is aimed at medical professionals and aims to provide quick information on drug combination therapy.

name: Mediscoop.net, le site de la médecine générale
description:
Le site web www.mediscoop.net, le site de la Médecine Générale a été créé en 2008, site de référence de la Médecine Générale Française. Il propose des articles scientifiques originaux, classés par thème, mais aussi des rubriques pratiques et des outils de suivi de l'actualité (agenda des congrès - associations de patients - banques de données - accès direct à la revue de presse MediScoop - liens). www.mediscoop.net est un véritable portail de la Médecine Générale Française qui a vocation à couvrir toute l'actualité scientifique et pratique de la Médecine Générale, à destination de tous les Professionnels de Santé concernés.

This site provides information about general medicine.

name: Medisite
description:
Medisite propose des informations médicales, des dossiers santé, bien-être et forme et des conseils au quotidien. Il fournit aussi des dictionnaires, maladies, médicaments et médecines alternatives entre autre, ainsi qu'un atlas anatomique.

Medisite provides general health information.

name: MediSur - Revista Científica de las Ciencias Médicas en Cienfuegos
description:
Revista Científica Electrónica de Ciencias Médicas de Cienfuegos. Órgano Científico de las Ciencias Médicas de Cienfuegos, Cuba.

Online medical journal of Cienfuegos, Cuba.

name: Meditrial
description: The Meditrial web site provides information on services Meditrial  has to offers to potential customers who require support in  clinical studies, from initial startup of studies to CE marking of  new devices.

name: Medizin-Transparent
description:
Auf www.medizin-transparent.at erscheinen mehrmals pro Woche kritische, evidenzbasierte Bewertungen von Medizin-relevanten Nachrichten in Online-Medien. Die Internetseite ist unabhängig und orientiert sich strikt an wissenschaftlichen Fakten zu Gesundheitsthemen, die aktuell in den Medien behandelt werden.

This website is focused on scientific facts from the perspective of health issues that are currently being discussed in the media.

name: National Library of Medicine's MedlinePlus
description: Assists consumers in locating appropriate, authoritative health  information through links to information from the National Institutes  of  Health (NIH), other US government organizations, and professional  and  voluntary health associations. Searches of MEDLINE/PubMed  have  been preformulated for over 800 diseases, conditions and health  topics  covered.  Also includes drug information from the American Society of  Health- System Pharmacists, herb and supplement information from  Natural  Medicines Comprehensive Database, a comprehensive clinical  trials  database developed by NIH and NLM, an illustrated medical  encyclopedia, medical dictionaries, health news, interactive health  tutorials, videos of surgical procedures, and directories of health  professionals, health facilities and libraries.  Includes special sections of easy-to- read materials and health  check  tools.  MedlinePlus en español (http://medlineplus.gov/espanol) is the  Spanish  version of MedlinePlus and is available by clicking on the español link in  the corner of every page. A mobile-optimized version is available  at  m.medlineplus.gov and m.medlineplus.gov/espanol and it can be  accessed from the Web browser of any mobile device.

name: Medspine
description: Este sitio provee información sobre el dolor de espalda, patologías relacionadas y su tratamiento.

name: The Student Doctor Network
description: A nonprofit educational community for students and doctors spanning all  the health professions.

name: Mein-allergie-portal
description: Diese Website bietet Allergikern und Personen mit Nahrungsmittelunverträglichkeiten eine zentrale Plattform, die viele Informationen bietet bzw. zu Informationen verlinkt, um ihr alltägliches Leben mit den Beschwerden besser zu gestalten. Sie bietet ein Portal das alle Allergien und Unverträglichkeiten thematisiert, auch die von Tieren. Ein Portal, das medizinische Informationen bietet, praktische Tipps gibt und über allergenfreie Produkte informiert  MeinAllergiePortal. Hier gibt es:     Aktuelle medizinische Informationen von Allergieexperten     Datenbanken für Experten, Restaurants, Hotels und Rezepte     Informationen zu interessanten Produkten     Informationen zu interessanten Büchern Es geht darum, die Öffentlichkeit für das Thema zu sensibilisieren, denn unbehandelte Allergien können sich zu gefährlichen Krankheiten weiterentwickeln (z.B. Asthma) bzw. lebensgefährliche Folgen haben ( z.B. allergischer Schock).

name: The Melanoma International Foundation
description: The site presents information  about melanoma. It has sections on prevention, early detection and treatment. The site is designed for general public, has a blog and forum. The forum is moderated by oncology and dermatology professionals.

name: Melbourne Hand Surgery
description: The Melbourne Hand Surgery website is authored by Dr Jill Tomlinson, a fully qualified plastic, reconstructive and hand surgeon who practices in Victoria, Australia. The website aims to inform patients and health professionals about hand surgery, illness prevention and the practice and philosophy of Dr Jill Tomlinson.

name: Grupo Menarini España
description:
Laboratoire pharmaceutique au service de la santé. Il y a des sections destinées aux profesionnels de la santé: médecins, pharmacie, distributeurs.

Laboratorio Farmacéutico al servicio de la salud. Presenta diferentes secciones a los profesionales de la salud.

Website of the pharmaceutical company Menarini España. Information and policy description of Menarini's Spanish branch.

name: The Menopause Exchange
description: This site provides unbiased and practical information on  menopausal symptoms, HRT, complementary therapies,  nutrition and self-help measures.It is independent and is not  sponsored by any companies or commercial organisations.  The Menopause Exchange aims to help women cope with  their menopausal symptoms and to inform healthcare  professionals.

name: Australasian Menopause Society
description: This site is Australia and New Zealand's information site on menopausal  health for both health care providers and consumers. The Australasian  Menopause Society (AMS) is committed to the advancement of  menopausal health by supporting research and promoting scientific  exchange. The AMS is commited to provision of accurate and  comprehensible information for women experiencing the menopause.

name: Menopause Health Matters
description: Menopause Health Matters is an independent website providing comprehensive, objective information to to help women make informed choices in the lead up to menopause an beyond.

name: Mental Health Watch
description: Mental Health Watch website provided information about mental  health and allerts patients to questionable theories and methods.

name: Association scientifique des médecins acupuncteurs de France et école française d'acupuncture (ASMAF-EFA )
description:
Ce site est consacré à l'acupuncture et à la médecine traditionnelle chinoise. De la tradition à la science en passant par les essais cliniques contrôlés et la médecine factuelle appliquée à l'acupuncture, ce site cible autant le médecin généraliste candide qui veut en savoir davantage sur une médecine alternative, que le médecin acupuncteur aguerri ou encore que le patient à la recherche d'une information. Il permet de trouver une information de confiance dans la jungle actuelle des informations données par des acteurs commerciaux non médecins.

This site provides information about acupuncture.

name: Mesothelioma.com
description: This site provides a range of information concerning mesothelioma, a cancer caused by asbestos exposure. The site focuses on medical information but also contains asbestos exposure and attorney services resources.

name: MesotheliomaGuide.com
description: MesotheliomaGuide.com is a trusted ally in the fight against  mesothelioma. With over a decade of experience, we are  uniquely capable of providing mesothelioma patients with  access to better care that can improve their prognosis.  MesotheliomaGuide.com offers innovative content and links to  health solutions.

name: Mesothelioma Help - Connecting Mesothelioma Patients and Caregivers
description: MesotheliomaHelp, America's Mesothelioma Resource, is  one of the web's primary resources for information on  malignant mesothelioma and other asbestos-related  diseases. Our team of writers, supporters and sponsors of  this site are dedicated to bringing the latest, most  comprehensive mesothelioma information to patients,  families and caregivers. Our goal is to provide the appropriate information to families  battling mesothelioma to empower them to participate in  making the decisions about their care, and to offer some  measure of hope and support.

name: Mexico Bariatric Center
description: This site provides information about surgical treatments of obesity. The  site also provides as the main communication tool for its clients, who  want to undergo weight loss surgery in Mexico.

name: Mhabos
description: This web site provides information on urology and urological diseases.

name: Dr. med. Michaela Schmid
description: This site provides information about Dr. med. Michaela Schmid's work  in her medical practice and information about gynaecology and midwifery.

name: Site professionnel d'information sur la greffe de cheveux
description:
Site d'information professionnel d'information destiné au grand public sur les différentes techniques actuelles d'implantation capillaire. Description des interventions, des suites, de l'évolution du traitement. FAQs détaillées.

This site provides information about hair implantation.

name: Microbiotes et probiotiques
description: Ce site contient des informations sur les microbiotes  (intestinal principalement mais aussi buccal et vaginal)  qui sont hébergés dans l'organisme humain et sur leurs  rôles sur la santé. Il contient également des informations  sur les modulateurs des microbiotes : probiotiques et  prébiotiques, notamment la façon dont ces modulateurs  contribuent à l'équilibre des microbiotes et plus  largement au maintien en bonne santé. Ces informations sont présentes sous forme d'articles  référencés, de définitions, de résumés d'études  scientifiques récentes ou encore d'interviews (vidéo ou  texte) de professionnels de santé investis dans le  champs des microbiotes et/ou probiotiques et  prébiotiques.

name: Mieli.Net - Tukijärjestelmä mielenterveystyöhön
description: Tämän sivuston tavoitteena on tarjota selkeää ja luotettavaa  tietoa   mielenterveydestä, siihen liittyvistä ongelmista sekä erilaisista keinoista  ratkaista niitä. Sivusto mahdollistaa myös yhteydenpidon samassa  tilanteessa olevien kanssa (vertaistuki) ja pääsyn sähköisiin julkisiin  palveluihin. Alan asiantuntijoilta saa tarvittaessa myös tukea netin  välityksellä (etätuki) ja vastauksia yleisiin kysymyksiin Sivusto on  suunniteltu henkilöille, jotka haluavat luotettavaa tietoa mielenterveydestä  ja siihen liittyvistä kysymyksistä.

name: International Myeloma Foundation Latin America
description:
This site provides education and support for multiple myeloma patients in Brazil.

Este site fornece educação e suporte para doentes com mieloma múltiplo no Brasil.

name: Migraine.com
description: This website aims to empower patients and caregivers to take  control of migraine disease by providing a platform to learn,  educate, and connect with peers and healthcare professionals.

name: Mijn Kinderarts.nl
description:
This site provides information on various issues regarding child healthcare from prenancy to adolescense. It is written in understandable language, readable for both public/parents and healthcare workers, Author is a registered Dutch pediatric physician.

Deze website wordt informatie gegeven over het gehele terrein van kindergeneeskunde.

name: Institut Miméthys
description: Le site www.mimethys.com présente les formations organisées par l'Institut Miméthys situé à Nantes pour les professionnels de santé et de la relation d'aide. Les formations dispensées sont au service de la pratique comme approches complémentaires de la thérapie et du soin. Le professionnel y apprendra et expérimentera à son rythme une autre manière de pratiquer. L' objectif est de permettre le tissage des liens entre les connaissances du thérapeute et les apports de la systémique, du constructivisme et du constructionnisme social.

name: mindhealthconnect
description: mindhealthconnect offers all Australians a go-to online destination that partners with leading mental health organisations to provide access to trusted online resources for Australian's who are concerned with their or someone else's mental health.

name: Minerva
description:
Ce site propose une information scientifique indépendante concernant le traitement, le diagnostic, la prévention et l'épidémiologie des affections les plus courantes en médecine générale. Cette information est donnée via la mise en ligne d'analyses critiques de publications pertinentes issues de la littérature internationale. Ce site offre également la possibilité d'une formation complémentaire continue électronique pour les dispensateurs de soins.

This site provides independent scientific information about treatment, diagnosis, prevention and epidemiology of the most common diseases in general medicine.

name: Minha Vida
description:
Minha Vida provides health information contents. The users can also watch videos, chat in discussion forums, take free evaluations and subscribe to an online diet program. As new generations focus increasingly on living healthier lifestyles instead of treating illness after it occurs, their appetite is for frequently updated health-related content.

Minha Vida disponibiliza conteúdos e informações gerais de saúde. Os visitantes podem também aceder a vídeos, chat em fóruns, testes online e programas dietéticos.

name: Miracle Babies Foundation
description:
This web site provides information about the Miracle Babies Foundation, Australia's leading organisation that supports premature and sick newborns, their families and the hospitals that care for them.
As Australia's premiere online resource for families of premature and sick newborns the site covers areas such as levels of care, staff and equipment. Families can read and submit birth stories, and explanations on topics such as causes of prematurity, common medical procedures, going home, follow on services and more in a most complete and easily readable way.

name: Mitral Valve Repair Reference Center - Mount Sinai Hospital
description: This site provides information for individuals who want to learn more about mitral valve repair vs. mitral valve replacement.  It is a resource that includes published articles and case studies as well as detailed information about the various mitral valve disease conditions and how they are treated.

name: Multilevel Marketing (MLM) Watch
description:
Provides comprehensive information about the history and current practices of multilevel (network) marketing.
Its activities include: analysis of health claims made for multilevel products; pinpointing the risks involved in becoming a multilevel distributor; warnings about inappropriate product claims; and helping people seek legal redress against MLM companies.

name: Mid North Coast Local Health District Public Website
description: The Mid North Coast Local Health District website provides  comprehensive information on services provided to the general public.   The site also provides links to information on organisations that  provide best practice health information to support health outcomes.

name: Moderate Drinking
description: This site provides an evidence-based, interactive program for heavy drinkers to learn how to moderate their drinking.

name: MonPediatre.net
description: Mon Pédiatre.net est le premier site interactif de conseils en  pédiatrie Il permet aux parents de se documenter sur tous les  domaines de la pédiatrie. C'est le premier site de conseils  interactif, entièrement dévoué à la pédiatrie.  On y trouve  des articles rédigés par des pédiatres et des professionnels  de la petite enfance, des pages interactives, des liens vers  les sites ou blogs jugés suffisamment intéressants du net.

name: Multiple Sclerosis, Motherhood, and Other Traumatic Experiences
description: This site provides online support and information for Multiple Sclerosis  patients.

name: MPN Stichting
description:
website van de myeloproliferatieve neoplasmata stichting welke informatie geeft over myeloproliferatieve neoplasmata, de stichting en lotgenoten.

Website of the myeloproliferative neoplasms foundation which provides information about myelproliferative neoplasms, the foundation and contact between patients.

name: mpedia.fr
description: Ce site est un site internet destiné aux futures et jeunes  parents édité par l'Association Française de Pédiatrie  Ambulatoire (AFPA). Il propose des conseils dédiés à la santé  et au bien-être des enfants de 0 à 11 ans dans un premier  temps et étendu jusqu'aux adolescents par la suite.

name: Radiologie-Mannheim
description:
Diese Websiete bietet interessierten Patienten ausführliche Informationen zur Praxis, den Ärzten und Mitarbeitern sowie zu den angebotenen Leistungen.

This web site provides information on the radiology centre in Mannheim.

name: Muco-Emera
description: Ce site contient une présentation du réseau EMERA, ses  promoteurs, ses acteurs et leur organisation, son objectif  et ses activités. Il présente également les différentes  propositions destinées tant aux patients et leurs familles  qu'aux professionnels de santé (libéraux et hospitaliers). Il  contient des outils d'aide aux professionnels sur de  nouveaux matériaux ou l'utilisation de certains  médicaments.

name: MundOtorrino
description: Mundotorrino es un blog dirigido al personal médico y a  todas las personas interesadas en la salud, sobretodo en  otorrinolaringología.

name: myDr.com.au
description: myDr is an Australian healthcare web site with an  Australian healthcare team dedicated to providing Australian  consumers  with relevant and comprehensive health information.

name: Transverse Myelitis Association
description: This web site provides information and support to families  affected by transverse myelitis, an acute spinal cord  inflammation of the spinal cord.

name: MyHEALTH Portal, Ministry of Health Malaysia
description: MyHEALTH portal was developed as an alternative for the people to have easy access to health information and education. MyHEALTH portal provides accurate and up-to-date information on health issues.  MyHEALTH portal was developed as a vital source of information and education on health for Malaysian through ICT. The portal was developed as one of the Telehealth components under MSC flagship. Since the commencement of the portal in 2005, it serves as an important source of information on local health issues. The portal serves as a source of information to suit the local needs covering a wide range of health issues.

name: Multiple Sclerosis Association of America
description: The goal of www.mymsaa.org is to provide a source of information on  multiple sclerosis based on professional advice, published research, and  expert opinion, as well as on the programs and services MSAA offers to the  MS community.

name: Virtual Medical Centre
description:
Virtual Medical Centre is the central site of 22 medical centres including medical information on topics from allergy to cardiology to weight loss.

It includes information on diseases, drugs, symptom management, effective treatments, clinical research and trials and news. Information is updated every 12 hours and includes interactives such as 3d animations, doctor and patient videos and useful tools. The information is regulated by over 1000 leading Australian medical specialists. There is information for the general public and a free password secure level of information for health professionals. On the password secure level, GPs can also do CME programs.

name: NMI Portal: Infoportal für Nahrungsmittel-Unverträglichkeiten
description:
Diese Website bietet ein sehr umfangreiches Angebot an Informationen zum Themengebiet Nahrungsmittel-Unverträglichkeiten und damit in Zusammenhang stehenden anderen Erkrankungen wie zum Beispiel Schilddrüsenunterfunktion. Die medizinischen Inhalte sind ausschliesslich in wissenschaftlichen Artikeln recherchiert und populärwissenschaftlich aufbereitet. Die Website beinhaltet u.a. auch Features wie ein Forum, Rezeptdatenbank oder Download-Tabellen.

This web site provides information on food incompatibility and food- related diseases such as thyroid dysfunction. Medical content is written exclusively by a scientific board. The web page provides also other features like forum, prescription database or downloadable tables.

name: Fondation de Nant

name: National Toxic Encephalopathy Foundation
description: This site provides medical citations, alternative health  resources, MSDS and referral link,s for those impacted by  the myriad of illnesses caused or exacerbated by the  environmental factors. We strive to achieve a comprehensive compilation of  resources for both the medical and lay populations  regarding the health risks and medical research regarding  chemicals that are found in consumer personal care  products.

name: Studio Medico Specialistico Navazio e Giovannini
description: This site provides information about the private practice with a special emphasis on gynaecology, endocrinology, dermatology and aesthetic medicine and related diagnosis and treatment.

name: National Board of Diving & Hyperbaric Medical Technology
description: This site provides information and an online store.  This site  informs visitors about the National Board of Diving &  Hyperbaric Technology (NBDHMT).  This site informs about  the Board's certification programs.  This site informs about  position statements written by the Board. Also, the  President of the Board writes a montly briefing that can be  viewed online. There is also a briefing archive.  This site  provides information on how to contact the NBDHMT  administrative staff and all Board members.

This site contains articles that  can help in evaluating health claims. It also offers  access to a free weekly e-mail newsletter.

name: NC Health Info

Go Local connects people to providers, support groups, wellness programs, etc. in their own communities and links to MedlinePlus, the comprehensive health web site from the National Library of Medicine.

- Increase awareness among health and human service professionals, community leaders and policymakers of key maternal and child health issues and resources in order to better assist the families they serve.
- Make women's, children's and infant's health information and resources accessible to English and Spanish speaking parents and caregivers.

description:
La mission du site est de sensibiliser les professionnels de santé, les familles et les patients aux problématiques de dénutrition et de présenter les solutions nutritionnelles de Nestlé Health Science.

The mission of the site is to educate health professionals, patients and families about problems of undernutrition and to present nutritional solutions of Nestlé Health Science.

name: NetCE

name: NetDoktor - Das unabhängige Gesundheitsweb für Österreich
description:

NetDoktor.at is the independent health portal in Austria. Its aim is to provide medical information from different fields of medical knowledge to general public.

name: NetDoktor
description: NetDoktor.dk is Scandinavia's leading medical web-site. Offering  more than 3.000 pages of facts and information about diseases, drugs  and health. Free Medline search, knowledge databases, ask the  Doctor online, patient associations and daily news updates.

description: Netdoktor.se is an independent vertical portal, offering a broad range  of information on diseases, health and treatments, free of charge. More than 100 Swedish doctors  assures  the quality of the medical content, and respond to questions trough an  interactive “Ask the doctor” service. Netdoktor.se also offers weekly  health  news, interviews, member driven discussion forums and blogs.

Curriculum e descrizione delle patologie trattate e dei casi clinici del dott. Franco Caputi, neurochirurgo. Informazioni sulla neurochirurgia, spiegate in modo semplice e comprensibile per il pubblico generale.

name: Neurocirurgia e Cirurgia da Coluna
description:
This site provides information about neurology and neurosurgery procedures. Frequent doubts about diseases and medical procedures are addressed.

name: International Neuromodulation Society
description: This site provides information from an international perspective about past,  current and emerging roles of neuromodulation in the management of  chronic health conditions.

name: Recursos en Trastornos del Movimiento
description: 'Recursos en Trastornos del Movimiento' es una plataforma que nace  de la necesidad de información científica y médica expresada por  especialistas en Trastornos del Movimiento. La plataforma tiene también  como objetivo actualizarles en las últimas publicaciones científicas e  informarle sobre ensayos clínicos en curso en esta materia.

name: Neurotoxicants.com

The site provides information about the risks  associated with exposure to neurotoxicants and all  information is supported by references to peer reviewed  publications.

name: Unidad de Investigación de Neurotraumatología del Hospital Vall d'Hebron
description:
Neurotrauma.com is the website of the Neurotraumatology and Neurosurgery Research Group (UNINN) at Vall d'Hebron University Hospital. Its research projects thoroughly study neurobiological and fisiopathological mechanisms in patients who suffered a traumatic brain injury, sever ischemic lesions and alterations in cerebrospinal fluid dynamics such as patients with hydrocephalus and pseudotumor cerebri.

Neurotrauma.com es el sitio web de la Unidad de investigación de Neurotraumatología y Neurocirugía (UNINN). La UNINN está integrada funcionalmente dentro del área de Neurociencias del Institut de Recerca Biomedica del Hospital Universitario Vall d’Hebron. En la actualidad nuestra unidad, centra su actividad de investigación traslacional en la fisiopatolología de la lesión cerebral traumática, de la isquemia cerebral grave y de las alteraciones de la dinámica de LCR.
Sus proyectos de investigación pretenden profundizar en el conocimiento de los mecanismos neurobiológicos y fisiopatológicos que acontecen en el paciente que ha sufrido un TCE, para transferirlos al ámbito clínico y que redunden en un mejor resultado funcional de los pacientes.

name: Nevasic - antiemetic control for the symptoms of nausea and vomiting
description: This site provides information covering a unique development in the  treatment of the symptoms of nausea and vomiting. It is shown how the  adoption of a new tactic can help resolve the symptoms of nausea and  vomiting in their early stages - and after the onset irrespective of cause.

name: News-Medical.Net
description: News-Medical.Net aims to segment, profile and distribute  medical news to the widest possible audience of potential  beneficiaries worldwide and to provide a forum for ideas,  debate and learning, and to facilitate interaction between all  parts of the medical health sciences community worldwide.

name: National Guard Health Affairs
description: The site is a representation of National Guard Health Affairs (NGHA)  Hospitals in Riyadh, Dammam, Jeddah, and Ahsa. It contains news  about the hospital, courses provided by the King Saud Bin Abdulaziz  University, Health Promotion information, including prevention and  diseases, and information about conferences organized by NGHA and  others. It also contains a magazine about the hospital, diseases, and  health prevention. Medical Library is availble but requires user login and  password.

name: National Health Portal funded by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare Government of India
description: The National Health Portal aims to make this as a single point  access for authenticated  health  information for citizens,  students, healthcare professionals and  researchers. The National Health Portal is achieving the above vision by  collecting, verifying and disseminating health  and health care  delivery services related information  for all citizens of India.

name: Das Infoportal für Nickelallergiker
description: Nickelfrei.de ist das Informationsportal für Nickelallergiker. Auf den  Seiten finden Sie  Infos und Tipps rund um das Thema Nickelallergie. Informativ und  übersichtlich wird  Aktuelles, Wissenswertes und manchmal auch Skurriles aus  Wissenschaft und Alltag  rund um das Thema Nickelallergie vorgestellt. Im Forum Besucher die  Möglichkeit sich  mit Betroffenen auszutauschen und Fragen an die Redaktion zu  stellen. Die Beiträge  des Redaktionsteams entstehen durch intensive Recherche,  jahrelanges Know How  und eigene Erfahrungen mit der Nickelallergie.

name: Nifab.no - Nasjonalt Informasjonssenter for Alternativ Behandling (The Norwegian Information Centre on Complementary and Alternative Medicine)
description: Nifab.no provides objective, research-based information safety and alleged  efficacy of alternative medicine forms and products.

name: NIHSeniorHealth

New  topics are added to the site on a regular basis. The web site's senior- friendly features include large print, short, easy-to-read segments of  information and simple navigation. A 'talking' function reads the text  aloud and special buttons to enlarge the text or turn on high contrast  make text more readable.

name: NIKIM
description: This site is a platform for disseminating scientific knowledge and  practical information about Integrative Medicine in the Netherlands. The site wants to contribute to building a network of people working in medicine and health care, active and interested in Integrative Medicine.

description:

name: NotJustSkin

name: NPSuisse

This web site provides information for patients and parents of children with Niemann-Pick disease.

name: NURE Investigación

En  este  sentido pretende ser no sólo un altavoz de la actividad científica  realizada bajo formato Vancouver, sino también de otra producción  científica, como protocolos, tesis y tesinas, proyectos de master, etc.  Además, se propone promover el uso de la investigación como  motor  de desarrollo de la disciplina enfermera.

name: Nursing Education Expert

Questo blog è gestito da un biologo nutrizionista. Diffonde informazioni e news riguardanti il cibo e l'alimentazione.

Website van de NVKC (Nederlandse Vereniging voor Klinische Chemie en Laboratoriumgeneeskunde) die met deze website informatie geeft over laboratoriumdiagnostiek aan niet medisch geschoolde particulieren en hun omgeving.
keywords: netherlands society for clinical chemistry and laboratory medicine

name: Odontofad

The main focus is helping the cancer patient live better during the before, during and after the treatment.

Oncoguia é um Portal informativo e Interativo voltado para a qualidade de vida do paciente com câncer e seus familiares. Disponibiliza informações úteis e completas sobre câncer, tratamentos, efeitos colaterais, dicas para enfrentar este momento de suas vidas, suportes multi-profissionais. O maior objetivo é mostrar ao paciente e sua família que é possível ter qualidade de vida antes, durante e depois do tratamento do câncer. e sua família que é possível ter qualidade de vida durante o tratamento do câncer.

description: This site provides timely oncology updates from international conferences, as well as reviews from key journal articles.  It also provides presentations authored by members of our team, on a variety of topics.  Links to clinical trials, practice guidelines, decision aids and drug information is also included.  The website is also a networking tool in that it offers links to other cancer centers and organizations both in Canada and around the world.

name: Oncologie et Radiothérapie - Clinique Sainte Clotilde - La Réunion - Océan Indien
description: Ce site internet est en ligne depuis 2016, il est régulièrement mis à  jour. ​ Les informations fournies sur ce site internet proviennent de la  littérature scientifique, de documents officiels de notre établissement  et de notre propre expérience. Elles sont destinées à améliorer, et  non à remplacer, la relation qui existe entre le patient et son médecin. ​ Ce site internet est exclusivement consacré à l'oncologie et la  radiothérapie. ​ Le docteur Michael BEGUE est l'auteur de ce site. Il ne reçoit aucun  soutien pour son financement et refuse toute forme de publicité. ​ Le docteur BEGUE utilise au maximum l'Internet médical pour la  communication, l'information et le suivi de ces patients.

name: The Online Dentist
description: The Online Dentist provides free and unbiased dental health  information to empower people take control of their dental  health. Users will have information to care for their teeth and  consider treatments that are appropriate for them .The site is  non-profit. The site has no sponsorship or commercial ties.

name: Orthopaedie Links
description:
The site was created by a Dr. in orthopaedics and provides more than 1600 links to German pages related to Orthopaedics.

It holds alphabetical databases for university and other acute phase orthopaedic clinics, rehabilitation clinics, orthopaedic physicians, scientific organisations uniting orthopaedicians, magazines in orthopaedics and related subjects, a guestbook and others.

name: Onmeda

Onmeda ofrece una amplia oferta de contenidos sobre cuadros clínicos y síntomas, se proporciona información sobre pruebas diagnósticas y se explican los procedimientos médicos.

name: oohs N coos

We also provide kids activity sheet. Our  main aim is providing information about getting pregnant,  pregnancy , child birth and parenting. http://www.oohsncoos.com/getting-pregnant/ http://www.oohsncoos.com/is-this-it-early-signs-of- pregnancy/ http://www.oohsncoos.com/child-care/

This site provides information about ophtalmology.

name: Ophtalmos

name: Observatory of Innovative Practices for Complex Chronic Diseases Management (OPIMEC)
description:
OPIMEC is the acronym in Spanish for the Observatory of Innovative Practices for Complex Chronic Disease Management. The Observatory is a project promoted by the General Directorate for Public Health and Consumer Affairs of the Andalusian Ministry of Health in Spain. Its development is carried out by the Strategic Plan for Caring People with Chronic Diseases in Andalusia (PAAIPEC) and the Andalusian School of Public Health (EASP), located in Granada, Spain, and a growing number of innovative people who share a keen interest in make collaborative efforts to globally improve care for people with chronic diseases, especially in the presence of comorbidity, through an integrated care model focused on people.

OPIMEC through a model of Web 2.0 and its virtual community, seeks to promote cooperation and partnerships between individuals, teams and organizations interested in sharing knowledge, experience and information on innovative practices and excellent organizations working in Chronic Disease Management and the modernization and improvement of health systems.

The Observatory was created in 2007 with the collaboration of Dr. Alejandro Jadad, Canada Research Chair in eHealth Innovation at the University of Toronto and the University Health Network in Canada.

Nowadays, the OPIMEC team it is formed by Dr. Manuel Ollero Baturone (OPIMEC coordinator and PAAIPEC Director), Carmen Pérez Romero (OPIMEC coordinator and Health Management professor), Luis Andrés López Hernández (Public Health professor), José Rodríguez Ocaña (Information Systems Professor), Diana Gosálvez Prados (Information and Knowledge Manager), Antonio J. Sánchez Contreras (Information Systems Manager) Isac Begoña Martínez (Community Manager), Eva Martin Ruiz (Content Manager) and Angel Luis Mena (Journalism Manager).

name: The Oral Cancer Foundation
description: This site provides peer reviewed information on oral cancer from risk factors and statistics to diagnosis, treatment, and after treatment issues. There is a survivor to patient forum moderated by doctors and nurses where those newly diagnosed can communicate with those who have had the disease before them. Resources to other important and reveiwed /vetted sites that will help those that are pateints or family members is also provided.

description:
This site provides links to evidence-based otolaryngology, Evidence reports, Critically Appraised Topical, Clinical Practice Guidelines, Technology assessments and health information.

Selección de enlaces a las guías clínicas otorrinolaringológicas basadas en la evidencia existentes en la red, enlaces a temas e intervenciones de otorrinolaringología en las principales bases de datos de la medicina basada en la evidencia, buscadores de Otorrinolaringología basada en la evidencia, información sobre libros on-line renovables con capítulos otorrinolaringológicos, enlaces a los principales Centros de Medicina basada en la evidencia y a otras páginas de interés.

name: Orpha Selbsthilfe
description:
Die Orpha Selbsthilfe ist ein Treffpunkt für Menschen mit seltenen Krankheiten und deren Angehörige. Die Webseite bietet Betroffenen und Angehörigen die Möglichkeit, sich zu finden, sich untereinander auszutauschen und Informationen zusammenzuführen.

Orpha Selbsthilfe is a meeting place for people with rare diseases and their relatives.This web site offers all stakeholders a platform to exchange experience, discuss topics and provide mutual support.

name: Orthodontiste en ligne
description: Site d'information générale sur l'orthodontie permettant au public de poser des questions et prendre une décision éclairée concernant toute intervention orthodontique.

name: Orthobotulinumtoxin
description: Diese homepage informiert über die bisherigen Absolventen sowie Existenz, Inhalte, Kursausrichtung, Referenten und Termine der zertifizierten IGOST-Kurse 'Botulinumtoxin in Orthopädie und Unfallchirurigie'. Die homepage soll kontinuierlich zum Informationsportal zum Thema ausgebaut werden. Die Inhalte sind - sofern nicht externe links - vom Verfasser ärztlich kontrolliert.

name: Cabinet d'Orthodontie HO VO TUAN
description: site d'information et d'aide aux patients du cabinet de chirurgie dentaire et d'orthodontie

name: Centre d'orthodontie et d'implantologie ruthénois
description: Site du cabinet d'orthodontie des Drs PASCUAL Didier, PASCUAL Dimitri, SUCRET Jacques Le site a pour mission de rendre accessible au patient, les informations nécessaires pour sa bonne compréhension des objectifs d’un traitement orthodontique et implantaire.

name: Docteur Thomas Rousseau
description: Le Dr Thomas Rousseau et le Dr Laurent Picard s’associent pour vous  proposer un haut niveau de diagnostic, de traitement et de suivi post- opératoire des pathologies de l’appareil locomoteur.

name: Orthopädische Chirurgie - Dr.med. Rolf F. Oetiker
description:
Wir sind spezialisiert auf die Behandlung von degenerativen und entzündlichen Leiden und Verletzungen des Bewegungsapparates. Wir bieten unseren Patientinnen und Patienten eine fachärztliche Untersuchung und Beratung sowie anschliessende Behandlung. Dazu gehören insbesondere operative Eingriffe, die nach Einweisung im Spital durchgeführt werden.

This web site provides information on the private practice specialized in the treatment of degenerative and inflammatory diseases and injuries of the musculoskeletal system.

name: Istituto Ortodermico Italiano
description:
L'Istituto Ortodermico Italiano applica un approccio multidisciplinare alla cura della calvizie. Il sito fornisce tutte le informazioni relative alla metodica dell'Istituto e alla cura delle varie forme di alopecia. Dall'autotrapianto alle norme igieniche, con le analisi consigliate e i prodotti da usare, l'elenco dei libri e delle pubblicazioni sulle malattie del cuoio capelluto. Collegamenti utili: centri medici, siti informativi.

This site provides information about hairloss. Description of the different techniques they use against hairloss, medical and surgical treatments.

name: ibotika - Información ciudadana sobre medicamentos
description:
Website with comparative drug information developed by a multidisciplinary group.

Página con información comparativa sobre medicamentos elaborados por un grupo multidisciplinar

name: Osteoporose Selbsthilfegruppen Dachverband - Informationsportal Osteoporose
description:
Die Website bietet aktuelles Wissen zur Osteoporose in patientengerechter Aufbereitung und aus dem Blickwinkel der Selbsthilfe: Der Osteoporose Selbsthilfegruppen Dachverband e.V. bietet Informationen zum Thema Osteoporose (Krankheitsbild, Diagnose, Prävention, Therapie) und Selbsthilfe.

The site provides information on osteoporosis, its treatment and self-help features.

name: Osservatorio Malattie Rare
description:
O.MA.R - Osservatorio Malattie Rare si propone come la prima agenzia giornalistica nazionale, regolarmente registrata, interamente dedicata al mondo della malattie e dei tumori rari. Obiettivo del progetto è primariamente quello di aumentare la sensibilità dell’opinione pubblica in materia di malattie e tumori rari attraverso una comunicazione chiara e scientificamente corretta sia su quanto riguarda la ricerca, le sperimentazioni in corso e il progresso medico- diagnositico, sia per quanto riguarda i servizi, le agevolazioni e l’assistenza - di livello nazionale e territoriale - di cui i malati possono usufruire.

The Observatory for Rare Diseases is intended as the first Italian news agency, duly registered, fully dedicated to the world of rare diseases and cancer. The project aims primarily to increase public awareness on rare diseases and cancer through a scientifically correct and clear communication.

name: Emmanuel Burguete Ostéopathe Lille Lomme
description: Ce site est destiné aux patients et aux professionnels de santé pour leurs faire connaitre la prise en charge en ostéopathie des bébés, enfant et femmes enceintes. Il donne aussi des informations sur l'auteur et son cabinet.

name: Cabinet d'ostéopathie de Lille Lomme Lambersart
description:
C'est un site d'information sur l'ostéopathie en général ainsi que de présentation pratique d'un cabinet d'ostéopathie. Il a pour objectifs: -d'expliquer avec des mots simples le travail d'un ostéopathe et le déroulement d'une séance, -la complémentarité avec les médecins et autres professionnels de santé.

This website provides information related to osteopathy.

name: Sabrina Lemenager Ostéopathe Boulogne Billancourt
description: Cabinet d'ostéopathie de Sabrina Lemenager Ostéopathe D.O.  à Boulogne Billancourt. Ostéopathie Générale, périnatale et  pédiatrique.  Plusieurs informations sur l'ostéopathie, les formations de  l'ostéopathe, des conseils vis à vis des consultations, l'accès  au cabinet, ainsi que plusieurs références, notamment  concernant la legislation ou la liste des mutuelles qui prennent  en charge l'ostéopathie.

name: Ortopedia Funcional dos Maxilares -Ajudando a boquinha a crescer
description:
The Ortopedia Funcional dos Maxilares(OFM) it's a speciality recognized by the CFO in 2002. Presently there is an effort to make it known to everyone. This blog intends to make known the 'Functionalism Paradigm' as a way to prevent and improve the occlusive pathologies of the mouth.

A Ortopedia Funcional dos Maxilares(OFM) é uma especialidade reconhecida pelo CFO em 2002.Há um esforço em divulgá-la aos diferentes públicos.Nosso blog,objetiva difundir o 'paradigma funcionalista',com uma visão preventiva,biológica e sistêmica na abordagem das oclusopatias.

name: otorinocapra
description: This site has an informative purpose over otolaryngology themes. and it  aims to provide visitors update information on the ear, nose and throat  diseases.

name: otorrino.pro
description:
This site provides information about otorhinolaryngology. Frequent doubts about some diseases and about procedures are discussed.

Este site fornece informações sobre otorrinolaringologia. Dúvidas frequentes sobre algumas doenças e sobre procedimentos cirurgicos são abordadas.

name: OurHealthcares
description: This site provides the user quick and easy access to free  and low-cost health promotion services in one's  community, as well as links to credible health informaton.  Community health services might include health  screenings, health fairs, vaccinations, smoking cessation,  illness and injury prevention, or programs and support  groups to improve the quality of life for those with chronic  health conditions such as diabetes or heart disease. In  order to better focus the user on finding health resources  and information without distraction, the site contains no  advertisements.

name: OxyRomandie - « Pour une Romandie où il fait bon respirer »
description:
Le site présente l'association OxyRomandie, une association suisse qui a pour but la prévention du tabagisme et la lutte antitabac sous toutes ses formes.

This website provides information about the association and its activities.

name: Précis d'anesthésie cardiaque
description:
Ce site offre un ouvrage en ligne, Le Précis d'Anesthésie Cardiaque avec bibliographie très complète et vidéos ainsi qu’une possibilité de téléchargement de l’ouvrage.

This website offers an on-line book, Le Précis d'Anesthésie Cardiaque with acomplete bibliography and videos, but it also offers on-line download of the book.

name: Paediatric Pearls
description: This site supports the continuing professional development of all health  professionals working with children. It offers a monthly update/newsletter  for General Practitioners (GPs) principally, but not exclusively, in north  east London, UK, as well as an edition aimed at Emergency Department  (ED) juniors. It also contains useful information, updates and links for PCT  managers, nurses, health visitors and junior paediatricians.

name: PAEDinfoline
description:
PAEDinfoline ist ein kostenfreies Angebot rund um die Kinderheilkunde, bestehend aus Informationsdatenbanken und medizinischen Anwenderprogrammen, mit dem wir uns in erster Linie an alle niedergelassenen Ärzte und Klinikärzte aus dem Bereich der Pädiatrie richten.

PAEDinfoline provides information databases and medical user programs about the child medicine, and is intended to all established physicians and hospital physicians from the range of the Paediatrie.

name: Paginemediche.it
description:
This site provides medical and health related news, services, utilities and information both to medical professionals and patients. A search engine, a medical centres data-base, a diseases/conditions enciclopedy and a Q&A service are available too.

Paginemediche: Approfondimenti Salute, Risposte dai Medici, Servizi dedicati al Benessere Paginemediche è la piattaforma italiana di Digital Health, con contenuti e servizi per la salute dei pazienti e l’aggiornamento dei medici.

name: Pathologie Dordrecht
description: De site biedt feitelijke informatie voor inzenders (huisartsen en  medisch specialisten) die hun diagnostiek laten verrichten door het  PAL.

name: Palliativedrugs.com
description: This site provides essential, comprehensive and independent  information for health professionals about the use of drugs in palliative  care. It highlights drugs given for unlicensed indications or by  unlicensed routes and the administration of multiple drugs by  continuous subcutaneous infusion.

name: Ginekološka ordinacija Palmotićeva
description:
Ginekoloki portal www.palmoticeva.com je besplatan i nezavistan portal zdravstvene ustanove Ginekoloka ordinacija Palmotićeva. Namenjen je zdravstvenom obrazovanju građanstva o bolestima i rizičnim činjenicama koji dovode do nastanka ginekolokih bolesti.

This web site is a free and independent portal on health care facilities in Palmotićeva gynecological practice (Belgrade).

name: paradisi
description: Die Website bietet Informationen in Form von ausführlichen  Artikeln sowie aktuellen Kurzmeldungen rund um eine gesunde  Lebensweise und medizinische Themen.

name: Parar de Fumar online
description:
This website gives some ideas and suggestions for quit smoking, Support as well a step-by-step help is also provided
