The SENACA System integrates state-of-the-art monitoring  devices to enable a patient to measure vital signs such as blood  pressure, weight or activity with automatic and secure transmission to  the personal health record. The SENACA Health Program (including  Monitoring, Medication, Nutrition, Activity and Knowledge) enables a  structured improvement of lifestyle & health literacy and thus better  health and increased quality of life.  SENACA was developed as a private initiative of an independent  Swiss CME and based on a health literacy project in collaboration with  Swiss universities and supported by the Swiss Comission for  Technology and Innovation (CTI).

name: Sociedad Española de Patología Digestiva
description:
Sitio web de la Sociedad Española de Patología Digestiva. Incluye información médica y científica de la sociedad, detalles sobre eventos y actividades relacionadas con la gastroenterología, enlaces a otras fuentes médicas e información para pacientes.

Web pages of the Spanish Digestive Diseases Society (Sociedad Española de Patología Digestiva).This Web site includes medical and scientific information of the Society, details of the events and activities related to gastroenterology, links to other medical resources, etc.

name: Serralco.es | Didys nursing notes | Blog de salud y Enfermeria
description: Artículos relacionados con la enfermería y el trabajo  interdisciplinar que realizamos, así como de salud y e-salud  y demas consejos sanitarios.

name: Unidad de psiquiatria. Hospital Universitario Casa de Salud Valencia
description: Web de la Unidad de psiquiatría del Hospital Universitario Casa de salud. Constituida por psiquiatras y psicólogos clínicos. Atennción a todo tipo de problemas de salud mental de adultos, niños y adolescentes desde una amplia perspectiva: médico-psiquiátrica y psicoterapéutica.

name: Servicio de Farmacia del C.H. La Mancha Centro
description:
Este sitio web es una publicación del Servicio de Farmacia del Complejo Hospitalario La Mancha Centro. Contiene información farmacoterapéutica dirigida a profesionales sanitarios para facilitar información objetiva y actualizada que contribuya al uso racional y seguro de los medicamentos. También contiene enlaces de referencia a nivel sanitario claramente identificados.

This website is the electronic version of the publication of the Pharmaceutical Service of the La Mancha Centro Hospital. It offers pharmacotherapeutic information for health professionals to promote and facilitate the rational and secure use of drugs.

name: SETH Sociedad Española de Trombosis y Hemostasia
description:
Sitio web oficial de la Sociedad Española de Trombosis y Hemostasia. Ofrece información sobre la trombosis y la hemostasia a profesionales.

The site is the official site of the Spanish Society on Thrombosis and Hemostasis. It provides medical and patient information on Thrombosis and Hemostasis, grants, and institutional information.

name: Sexe, drogue et nutrition
description:
Ce site contient des articles traitant de santé, plus particulièrement sur la nutrition, la médecine et la sexualité. Ces articles sont rédigés en fonction de l'actualité, des centres d'intérêt de l'auteur et des évènements personnels auxquels elle participent ou dont elle entend parler.

This website provides information related to nutrition, sex and drug.

name: Site de la Société Française de Gynécologie
description: Ce site s'adresse aux gynécologues et aux professionnels de santé de domaines connexes ainsi qu'aux étudiants en médecine. Les documents et informations scientifiques proposées sont rédigés ou sélectionnés et validés par les membres du Bureau ou les responsables des sections de la SFG en toute indépendance. Ce site a pour mission de délivrer toutes les informations relatives à la vie de la Société Française de Gynécologie et délivre des informations scientifiques validées, notamment via sa newsletter : le e-Journal du Gynécologue.

name: Société Française de Phlébologie
description: Ce site contient des informations sur les maladies veineuses et leurs  traitements.

name: Société française de colposcopie et de pathologie cervicovaginale - SFCPCV
description:
Ce site est destiné à informer sur la pathologie du col et du vagin.

This website provides information about the pathology of the cervix and vagina.

name: sfendocrino
description: Le portail sfendocrino.org appartient à la Société française d'endocrinologie (SFE). La SFE est une société savante. Ce portail fédère les différentes informations concernant l'endocrinologie diabétologie et  les maladies métaboliques

name: SOCIETE FRANCAISE DE GREFFE DE MOELLE ET DE THERAPIE CELLULAIRE ( SFGM-TC )
description:
Ce site appporte des informations sur la greffe de moelle et les thérapies cellulaires, ainsi que sur les activités de la Société.

This site provides information about marrow transplantation and stem cell therapy, as well as on the activities of the Company.

name: Société française d'hypertension artérielle
description:
Le portail sfhta.org appartient à la Société française d'hypertension artérielle (SFHTA), une société savante, filiale de la Société Française de Cardiologie. Ce site fédère les différentes informations concernant l'hypertension artérielle. Il s'adresse en essentiellement aux hypertensiologues, chercheurs, médecins généralistes, cardiologues, médecins d'autres spécialités et étudiants du domaine médical.

This website provides information about hypertension and about the association.

name: Société Francophone d'Imagerie Pédiatrique et Prénatale
description: Ce site correspond au serveur officiel de la Société  Francophone d'Imagerie Pédiatrique et Prénatale (SFIPP). Cette société  savante a pour but la promotion des techniques d'imagerie  médicale utilisées chez l'enfant. Le site annonce et rend  compte des différentes manifestations (congrès, cours)  organisées par cette association.

name: Société Française de Pharmacie Oncologique
description: Ce site est un site de communication auprès et par les pharmaciens  exerçant dans les hopitaux et dans le domaine de l'oncohématologie.  Il permet de créer un espace d'informations générales et/ou  spécifiques sélectionnées par les membres du bureau de  l'association; Il permet également d'obtenir les dates et inscriptions  aux manifestations annuelles de la société savante.

name: SFRMS
description:
Le portail sfrms.org appartient à la Société Française de Recherche du Sommeil (SFRMS). La SFRMS est une société savante. Ce portail fédère les différentes informations concernant le sommeil.

This website provides information about the Society and about sleep.

name: SOCIETE DE GERIATRIE DES PYRENEES ORIENTALES
description: il s'agit d un site de formation médicale con tinue destiné  aux médecins geriatres et gerontologues des pyrenées  orientales  les membres de l 'association sont libéraux ,hospitaliers,et  exercent aussi bien en médecine générale  et de  spécialités(cardiologue,réeducateur fonctionel,néphrologue)

name: Selbsthilfe Vaskulitis e.V.
description: Die Website Regionalgruppe-Vaskulitis e.V. Eifel-Mosel-Hunsrück  bietet für Vaskulitis-Betroffenen, Angehörige und Interessierte viel fachliche interessante Informationen an.

name: ShoulderDoc
description: This site provides information on common Shoulder & Elbow  Diseases and Injuries for Patients and Professionals.

name: Societa' Italiana di Chirurgia Colo-Rettale
description:
La Società Italiana di Chirurgia Colo-Rettale è una associazione di medici dedicati a questa disciplina; si attiva per assicurare il più alto standard terapeutico dei pazienti mediante la valutazione e l’introduzione nella pratica medica dei progressi della scienza nei campi della prevenzione, della diagnosi e della cura delle malattie del colon, del retto e dell’ano. La Società Italiana di Chirurgia Colo-Rettale promuove e sostiene la ricerca scientifica in tutti gli aspetti clinici e biologici delle malattie coloproctologiche. Il sito offre informazioni per pazienti e specialisti.

This is the website of the Italian Society for Colorectal Surgery. It provides medical information for patients and doctors about colorectal surgery and proctology.

name: National Paediatric Mortality Register
description:
The National Paediatric Mortality Register provides up-to-date information on Sudden Infant Death Syndrome in Ireland. The site:
-Provides bereaved families with up-to-date information on SIDS & available support services.
- Educates the public and health care professionals about SIDS and ways of reducing the risk
- Provides professionals with guidelines to assist them in caring for bereaved families
- Provides a national register of all sudden, unexpected, deaths for which cause of death is not identifiable following a post mortem examination, in the infant population
- Identifies and categorises all deaths in children from birth to 2 years of age in the Republic of Ireland
- Collects comprehensive epidemiological data on all cases of sudden unexpected deaths in infancy.

name: SIP Sport - Società Italiana di Pneumologia dello Sport
description:
La SIP-Sport, nata nel 1997, è una società scientifica tra Medici cultori di interessi scientifici e clinici connessi con la Pneumologia nell’ambito della Medicina dello Sport (Soci Aderenti) e/o Specialisti in Pneumologia o Medicina dello Sport (Soci Ordinari). La SIP-Sport si prefigge di approfondire lo studio dell’apparato respiratorio impegnato nell’esercizio fisico (aspetto fisiologico), e di affrontare le problematiche pneumolgiche nell’ambito medico-sportivo (aspetto fisiopatologico). E’ suo compito la visione continua ed aggiornata dello scibile pneumologico e medico sportivo volto alla tutela sanitaria non solo dell’atleta d’èlite, ma anche, e soprattutto, dell’atleta amatoriale e di chiunque si avvicini all’attività fisica e sportiva (aspetto preventivo), nonché di mantenere aggiornati i criteri di idoneità pneumologica alle attività sportive agonistiche, ed a quelle igienico ricreative. Le informazioni riportate su questo sito sono rivolte a pneumologi, medici dello sport, medici, nurse, personale sanitario, studenti, laureati in scienze motorie, psicologi, allenatori e istruttori, sportivi e internauti appassionati della materia.

The SIP-Sport is a medical society that studies pneumology in sport medicine. Its goal is to study the respiratory system during physical exercise (physiological aspect), and to cope with lung problems in the sports medicine domain (physio-pathological aspect).

name: SiteGPR
description: Le SiteGPR propose :     * Des outils d'évaluation de la fonction rénale (selon la formule de Cockcroft-Gault et aMDRD)     * Un formulaire pour la consultation du service ICAR (service de conseil et d'aide à la prescription des médicaments chez le patient insuffisant rénal créé en 1999 au sein du Service de Néphrologie de l'Hôpital Pitié-Salpêtrière à Paris)     * Un moteur de recherche par médicament (750 DCI)     * Un moteur de recherche par GPR (Guide de Prescription & Rein, la collection de guides de prescription rédigés et édités par l'équipe du Service ICAR depuis 11 ans).

name: Healthcare University
description: This site provides reliable information with articles supervised by  healthcare professionals for solving healthcare problems.

name: EDUKACJA KREGOSLUP W DZIALANIU
description: Celem tej strony jest informowanie zainteresowanych o schorzeniach, sposobach ich leczenia, wskazaniach i przeciwwskazaniach do ewentualnego postępowania chirurgicznego. Ilość stosowanych terapii, alternatywne sposoby leczenia oraz mnogość nazw, nie ułatwiają wyboru postępowania. Pragniemy, aby jak najmniej Pacjentów czuło się zagubionych czy niedoinformowanych. Inspiracją do powstania i rozwoju tego serwisu są życie i doświadczenie. Mamy nadzieję, iż dostarczone informacje wyjaśnią chociaż niektóre wątpliwości i pomogą Państwu w wyborze najlepszego możliwego leczenia. Jednocześnie prosimy pamiętać, iż nawet najbardziej przystępne wirtualne narzędzie edukacji zdrowotnej nie zastąpi potrzeby i wartości bezpośredniego kontaktu Pacjenta z Lekarzem. This site provides information about the diseases, methods of treatment, to any spine surgical procedure. Number of therapeutic treatments, alternative treatments, and the multitude of names, do not facilitate the selection procedure. We want as little as possible Patients felt lost or uninformed. The inspiration for the creation and development of this site are life and experience and medical and science knowledge. We hope that the information provided will explain although some doubts and help you in choosing the best possible treatment. At the same time, please keep in mind that even the most affordable health education, virtual tool does not replace the need for and value of direct contact with the doctor patient.

name: speech-language-therapy dot com
description: Caroline Bowen, PhD is an Australian Speech-Language  Pathologist. Her user-friendly and regularly updated web site  provides evidence-based, theoretically sound information for  families, students and SLP professionals about communication  disorders. It includes extensive information about children’s speech  sound disorders (articulation disorders, phonological disorders and  childhood apraxia of speech), child speech intervention resources  and relevant links.

name: SmartSport
description:
SmartSport propone informazioni su sport per tutti, attività fisica e salute, medicina dello sport. E’ gestito da un medico dello sport e un laureato in scienze motorie affiancati da altri collaboratori, professionisti nelle branche di interesse. Obiettivo primario del sito è la promozione dell’attività fisica per la salute secondo le linee guida dell’OMS. Si possono trovare nel sito esempi di esercizi fisici e di attività sportive così come notizie sulla medicina dello sport e la promozione dell’attività fisica.

This site provides information about sport for all, physical activity and health, and sport medicine. It's made by a sports medicine doctor, a graduated in Physical Education, and other professionals in this field. The main goal of the site is promoting physical activities for health (WHO guidelines). You can find in the site several examples of physical exercises and sports activities as well as news about sport medicine and physical activity promotion.

name: Société Française de Chirurgie Orale (SFCO)
description:
Ce site présente la Société Française de Chirurgie Orale ; une partie concerne les professionnels, l'autre vise l'information aux patients.

This website presents the Société Française de Chirurgie Orale ; a part of it is related to professionals, the other one is informing patients.

name: Portal Web de la SOGACOT
description:
Portal Web de la Sociedad Gallega de Cirugía Ortopédica y Traumatología, dedicado a los profesionales de COT y al mundo de la traumatología.

Orthopedic Surgery and Traumatology Society of Galicia. This website is aimed to professionals in this area.

name: Soins Infirmiers à Bordeaux Bacalan, Lac et Bassins à flot. Infirmière libérale à domicile ou au cabinet infirmier.
description: Cabinet infirmier installé à Bordeaux Bacalan (33300). Soins infirmiers au  cabinet ou à domicile par Fany Marco-Hernandez et Martine Etcharren,  infirmières libérales diplômées d'état conventionnées. Nous intervenons  à domicile sur Bordeaux Bacalan, Bassins à flot et Bordeaux Lac :  Ginko, Les Aubiers, Résidence du Lac. Nous recevons les patients au  cabinet 7j/7 sur rendez-vous. Nous effectuons tous les soins infirmiers  sur prescription médicale et possédons la certification oncologie.

name: Cabinet de Soins Infirmiers à Bordeaux
description: Cabinet de Soins Infirmiers à Bordeaux et sa région (CUB) qui  effectue tous les soins infirmiers ainsi que les soins de chimiothérapie  sur prescription médicale. Intervention rapide d'une infirmière libérale  à domicile ou au cabinet infirmier

name: Soins et cours infirmiers
description: Site français sur les soins infirmiers, les modules et les cours de la formation infirmière, la pharmacologie, les examens biologiques et médicaux, le TEFE (travail de fin d'études).

name: SomaPsy
description: SomaPsy est un portail de diffusion de la connaissance de la  Fondation de Nant. Il a pour mission de collecter, analyser et publier  les documents à connaître portant sur les tendances et faits  marquants des expériences internationales autour de l'intégration des  soins aigus et de santé mentale. L'objectif est de profiter de ces expériences novatrices internationales en les diffusant aux acteurs  régionaux de la santé et promouvoir ainsi des initiatives à mettre en  oeuvre au plan régional.

name: Service d'Oncologie Médicale de l'Hôpital TENON
description:
Le site www.somht.com a été dans le but d'apporter une information adaptée aux patients atteints de cancer et à leur entourage.
Ce site se veut simple et facilement accessible, adapté aux patients, leur permettant ainsi de faire connaissance avec les Femmes et les Hommes qui travaillent en Cancérologie. Le site permet également de délivrer des informations médicales, des informations sur la vie dans le service et l'hôpital Tenon, sur les modes organisationnels ainsi que des informations juridiques.

name: SOSORT mobile
description: This website aims at posting all the  relevant documents suggested or  approved by the Board or the General Assembly, advertising promptly  SOSORT meetings, courses, fellowships etc., posting the society's  Newsletter on the web page and collecting information of SOSORT  members, regarding professional activities and special interests in  conservative treatment of spinal deformities as well as their contact  details and posting them on the web page after obtaining their consent.

name: Specimen Care
description: This site provides education and data on the preanalytical  phase of laboratory testing in clinical medicine for laboratorians  and medical professionals.

name: Sphère-Santé : informations sur l'incontinence
description:
Ce site contient des informations sur les types, les causes et les traitements de l'incontinence. Vous pourrez également y trouver des témoignages de patientes, un forum de discussion ainsi que des protections absorbantes.

This website provides information about Urinary Incontinence.

name: HIV & Hepatitis
description: The website was designed to help educate healthcare professionals  and patients on the topics of HIV and viral hepatitis.

name: Spine-health.com
description: Spine-health.com is a comprehensive resource for patients  seeking spine information. Spine-health.com has thousands  of pages of clearly written and insightful content  covering a wide range of back/neck conditions and  treatment options, including surgery and non-surgical  treatments. All articles are written and peer-reviewed by  leading spine specialists.

name: Spineopedia
description: This site provides spine care providers, researchers, and  healthcare consumers with links to the most up to date  spine related clinical investigations and studies,  aggregated in one website. This site also provides a  thorough review of historical and contemporary spine  related studies that is free of commercial bias to allow  the reader to decide if the evidence that we are basing  treatment on is reliable.  Spineopedia encourages feedback from users and  welcomes scholarly discussion in regards to published  reviews.

name: Société de Pneumologie de Langue Française
description:
Site de la Société de Pneumologie de Langue Française est destiné aux pneumologues francophones, médecins d'autres spécialités francophones, étudiants dans le domaine des pathologies respiratoires, malades atteints de pathologies respiratoires. Il contient des informations professionnelles destinées à ce public.

This site provides information about pneumology.

name: sport-arzt
description:
Als regionales Zentrum für Leistungsmedizin, Trainingssteuerung und Sporternährung würde ich mich freuen, ihnen mit meinem Leistungsangebot dienen zu können.

This web site provides information on the private practice of Dr Schlömmer specialized in sport medicine and their services.

name: Sociedad Panameña de Pediatría
description:
La información contenida en esta web, a excepción de la revista EL PEDIATRA, está dirigida exclusivamente a profesionales de la salud y profesiones afines. Tiene como fin constituirse en una fuente de discusión y actualización médica. La revista EL PEDIATRA está dirigida a los padres y/o público en general, y contiene información general y educativa.

The website of the Panamanian Pediatric Society offers information about the society, medical information for health professionals, and a medical journal with pediatric information for parents and the general public.

name: Saarbrücker Qualitätszirkel Schlafmedizin
description:
Diese Webseite bietet Informationen zum Saarbrücker Qualitätszirkel Schlafmedizin. Dieser ist eine interdisziplinäre Arbeitsgruppe von Ärzten, die sich mit der Diagnose und der Therapie von Erkrankungen des Schlafes beschäftigen. Auf der Seite werden Informationen zu den Terminen, den Mitgliedern und den Veröffentlichungen des Arbeitskreises mitgeteilt.

This website offers information on sleep medicine provided by an interdisciplinary group of physicians.

name: Saarbrücker Qualitätszirkel CMD / Orofaziale Schmerzen
description:
Diese Webseite bietet Informationen zum Saarbrücker Qualitätszirkel CMD/Orofaziale Schmerzen, einer Vereinigung von Therapeuten die sich mit Dysfunktionen des Kauapparates oder orofazialen Schmerzen beschäftigen. Es werden aufgelistet die Mitglieder, die Termine und Publikationen.

This web site provides information about the interdisciplinary group of medical professionals in Saarbrücken, Germany.

name: Sociedad Riojana de Medicina de Familia y Comunitaria
description:
Official site of the Rioja Society of Family Medicine that grouping several physicians from La Rioja (Spain). On this website you can find information on health issues for health professionals and patients.

Página oficial de la Sociedad Riojana de Medicina de Familia y Comunitaria que agrupa varios médicos de familia de La Rioja (España). En esta web encontrarás información sobre temas de salud para profesionales de la salud y pacientes.

name: St. Andrew Development, Inc.
description: This site primarily addresses health and human service  information  distribution to underserved communities. Specifically, it  contains  information on kiosk information offered by the American  Cancer  Society, the American Lung Association and the American Liver  Foundation.

name: Association Sclérose Tubéreuse de Bourneville
description:
Ce site présente une association de parents et de proches directement concernés par la sclérose tubéreuse de Bourneville. Le site offre des informations utiles aux malades, parents et proches touchés par la sclérose tubéreuse de Bourneville.

This site presents an association of parents of children affected by the Tuberous Sclerosis Complex (TSC). The site offers useful information for the families of childern suffering from the Tuberous Sclerosis Complex (TSC).

name: Stiftung Gesundheit
description:
Die Stiftung Gesundheit ist eine gemeinnützige rechtsfähige Stiftung bürgerlichen Rechts. Satzungsgemäße Aufgabe der Stiftung ist es, Transparenz im Gesundheitswesen zu fördern und praktische Orientierungshilfe zu bieten.

This web site provides information on the non-profit foundation Stiftung Gesundheit and its services.

name: Stoma-Welt
description:
Stoma-Welt ist das deutschsprachige Informations- und Selbsthilfeportal für Menschen mit einem künstlichen Darmausgang oder einer künstlichen Harnableitung (=Stoma), deren Angehörigen und Interessierte. Stoma-Welt bietet Information, Aufklärung und Erfahrungsaustausch zum Thema Stoma von und für Stomaträger.

This web site provides information on ostomy for patients.

name: Stichting Stomaatje
description:
Website van de Stichting Stomaatje welke informatie geeft over stoma's.

Website of 'Stichting Stomaatje' (Stomaatje Foundation) which gives information about stoma's.

name: Cabinet de stomatologie Christian Touzet
description:
Site du cabinet de Stomatologie du Docteur Christian TOUZET à Oullins (Rhône).
La Stomatologie est une spécialité médicale et chirurgicale qui prend en charge les affections de la cavité buccale et de son environnement. Les plans de traitement proposés sur ce site sont soit médicaux, soit chirurgicaux.

The website of Doctor Christian Touzet's medical office in Oullins (Rhône).
The stomatology is a medical and surgical specialty which takes care of the oral cavity. The treatment plans provided on this website are medical or surgical.

name: De Nederlandse Stomavereniging
description: Patienten vereniging die bevordering van een zo gunstig mogelijke  lichamelijke, psychische en sociale conditie van mensen met een  stoma of pouch en mensen die een stoma hebben gehad  voorstaat.

name: Stop Alcohol - Stop alcool
description:
Ce site a été conçu pour motiver les visiteurs et les aider à réduire sa consommation ou arrêter de boir.

The aim of this site is to motivate and help people reduce or stop drinking alcohol.

name: Stop-Cannabis
description:
Ce site a été conçu pour motiver les visiteurs et les aider à cesser de fumer

This site's aim is to motivate and help people quit smoking.

name: Stop Tabac: conseils individualisés pour arrêter de fumer
description: <DT>Sur ce site les fumeurs et les ex-fumeurs trouvent: <DD>- des conseils individualisés pour arrêter de fumer ou  éviter la rechute. Un compte rendu individuel de quelques  pages est envoyé aux participants 10 secondes après qu'ils  ont répondu à un questionnaire, <DD>- une série de brochures adaptées à leur degré de  motivation à arrêter de fumer, <DD>- des adresses de consultations de sevrage et d'autres  sites Web sur le tabagisme.  <DD>-des témoignages, forums et chat pour communiquer  entre  utilisateurs.</dt>
language: french, english, german, italian, danish, chinese

name: Atrial Fibrillation Patient Resource
description: StopAfib.org is a resource created by atrial fibrillation  patients for atrial fibrillation patients and provides  perspectives on living with, controlling, and curing  afib. An Atrial Fibrillation Services Directory locates  electrophysiologists, surgeons, and hospitals that treat  afib and includes reviews by afib patients. Translation into 80  languages available on the site.

name: Association Stop suicide - Genève
description:
Le site présente l'association STOP SUICIDE, un mouvement de jeunes basé à Genève qui lutte contre le tabou du suicide et pour une prévention efficace du suicide des jeunes. Le site donne accès à de nombreuses ressources d’aide (HelpLine, consultations…) pour les adolescents et les jeunes adultes de Suisse romande ainsi qu'à de la documentation et des informations sur le suicide des jeunes.

This site provides information about the association Stop suicide based in Geneva and its activities in all the swiss french speaking part. The main goal of the association is to prevent youth suicide through primary prevention in Romandie.

name: Karin Spanier-Fehse Hebamme
description:
Die Internetpräsenz informiert Mütter, werdende Mütter und Väter über die Zusammenarbeit von Hebamme und Eltern vor, während und nach der Geburt. Sie informiert über Ort, Lage und Qualifikation der Hebamme und Ihrer Praxis.

This web site presents the private practice of Karin Spanier-Fehse and her services.

name: Stotteren
description:
Website van de Nederlandse Federatie Stotteren welke voorlichting geeft over stotteren.

Website of the Dutch Stutter Federation which provides information about stuttering.

name: Strahlentherapie Singen
description:
Diese Webseite bietet Informationen betreffend die Strahlentherapie allgemein und die Behandlungsmöglichkeiten sowie die Ausstattung der Gemeinschaftspraxis für Strahlentherapie in Singen und Friedrichshafen im Besonderen.

This web site provides information on the private practice for radiotherapy and its services.

name: Breast Equity
description: This advertisement-free website provides relevant, patient-centered information about breast cancer treatment and diagnosis to those living with breast cancer.  It also provides information to help educate the lay public on how they may advocate for themselves to get the type of health care they desire.

name: studio Fico dentisti associati
description: This website provides information on 'Studio FICO Dentisti Associate' with  information on the diagnosis, prevention, and treatment of diseases and  conditions of the oral cavity.

name: Studio Medico Destefanis
description:
Studio Medico di Genova con Medici di Medicina Generale e Pediatri convenzionati col Servizio Sanitario Nazionale e organizzati secondo il modello della Medicina di Gruppo.

Genoa medical practice that includes General Practitioners and Pediatricians, operating within the Sanitary Service National and organised according to the model of Medicine of Group.

name: Studio Pescatore
description: This site provides medical informations to professional and  non-professional users in the fields of 'laser-assisted dentistry  and laser cosmetic medicine  (bibliography section). Provides  general information on the health of the population (news  section). Finally, the experimental details of the laboratory  laser (laboratory section).

name: Stuttering Home Page
description: This site provides information about stuttering, stuttering therapy, cluttering, confererences, course syllabi, books about stuttering, stuttering support organizations, resources for children and teens who stutter,and more.

name: Tua Saúde
description:
This website provided information on several drugs and also over several medical conditions. It is made available with a simple language even to reach the non- medical visitors.

Este website publica informações práticas sobre vários medicamentos e condições médicas. Tem uma linguagem objectiva e clara mesmo para quem não é da área da saúde.

name: SunnSkepsis
description: The site serves as a generic (non disease-specific) tool developed in  the conceptual  framework of shared decision making and evidence based practice  aiming to empower  patients by improving health literacy skills and access to evidence  based information.

name: Surdi Info, Centre National d'Information Surdité
description: Surdi.info, Centre National d'Information sur la Surdité (CNIS), a été  créé à l'automne 2013. Il a pour objectif principal de permettre à chaque personne confrontée à la surdité (qu'elle soit sourde de naissance ou devenue sourde) et/ou à sa famille d'accéder à une information homogène où qu'elle se trouve sur le territoire. Sa mission est de collecter, élaborer et diffuser l'information sur les questions concernant la surdité, notamment l'éducation et la formation des jeunes sourds, la vie quotidienne des personnes sourdes ou malentendantes, la réglementation, les différents modes de communication, les outils de compensation du handicap, la prise en charge médicale de la surdité.

name: Australian Safety and Efficacy Register of New Interventional Procedures - Surgical (ASERNIP-S)
description: This site provides access to systematic reviews on the safety and efficacy of new surgical techniques, and reports on audits that collect information on surgical procedures. Consumer information is provided. ASERNIP-S is a program of the Royal Australasian College of Surgeons. See www.surgeons.org/asernip-s/net-s.htm for details on horizon scanning for new surgical techniques.

name: Surgery Indeed
description: This site provides health informations between patient, surgeon,  industry and scientific community.The main targets are the  management of the personal surgical activity and the management of  the personal on line book with e-portfolio and colums.Open source  utilities are integrated.

name: Polio Survivors In The 21st Century
description: Dedicated to victims of polio along with their family and  friends. All polio resources on this website are strictly  monitored for up to date Post-Polio Survivors information  and resources.

name: Société Suisse de Pédiatrie (SSP)
description:
Le site est composé de plusieurs parties: informations aux parents (petites pathologies, quand consulter, etc), informations officielles de la Société Suisse de Pédiatrie (SSP), agenda des congrès et autres formations post-graduées reconnues. Ce site offre de l'information pour les pédiatres et les parents.

This website consists of several parts : informations to parents, official informations from SSP, schedule of the congresses and other recognized continuous training. This website offers informations for paediatricians and parents.

name: Swiss Teratogen Information Service
description:
Ce site contient les informations relatives au centre suisse de teratovigilance. Il décrit les missions du centre, donne l'adresse de contact et une liste des informations nécessaires au centre lors d'une demande. Il offre également des liens vers d'autre sites.

This site contains the relative informations in the Swiss center of teratovigilance. It describes the missions of the center, gives addresses contact and a list of the necessary information to the center at the time a request.

name: SYMPATH
description: SYMPATH is an EU funded research project to analyze the safety of the first two therapeutic vaccine candidates for Parkinsons disease and multiple-system atrophy that could hinder disease progression.

name: Das grösste Gesundheitsportal der Schweiz
description: Die Website will mögliche Ursachen von Krankheiten thematisieren und Vor- und Nachteile von Schulmedizin und Alternativmedizin zu beleuchten. Wichtigste Bestandteile sind ein Blog mit bekannten/geschulten Autoren aus dem Bereich der Gesundheit, sowie ein Wiki und ein Forum für die Kommunikation interessierter Laien.

name: Syndicat des Dermatologues et  Vénéréologues
description: Ce site contient des informations sur la dermatologie, sur la dermatologie esthétique, les lasers, les maladies de la peau tel que les cancers de la peau, le psoriasis, l'acné, l'eczéma . Un annuaire des professionnels par région et par ville avec leur spécificités photothérapie, chirurgie dermatologique, lasers,allergologie, phlébologie.

name: sysVASC
description: This website provides an overview of the research being performed in the collaborative FP7 research project entitled sysVASC. SysVASC aims to identify the causative events in cardiovascular diseases in order to predict novel therapeutic targets. The sysVASC consortium includes 17 partners from 10 countries.

name: Tabac & Liberté: aide au sevrage tabagique - Prévention et conseil
description: Ce site contient des informations pour informer le grand public et les professionnels de santé sur tout ce qui concerne le tabac. Depuis son introduction en France, au XVIIIème siècle jusqu'à ce jour. Il décrit aussi les intérêts financiers liés au commerce du tabac et met l'accent sur tous les méfaits qu'entraine le tabagisme. Il donne aussi des perspectives pour arrêter de fumer, les différentes thérapeutiques scientifiquement validées et permet au lecteur d'avoir des réponses complémentaires en écrivant au Docteur Tobacco.

name: Corporació Sanitària Parc Taulí
description:
Sitio web de Corporación Sanitaria Parc Taulì. Provee información acerca de los servicios que la institución ofrece, así como información de salud dirigida tanto a profesionales como a pacientes.

Web site of the Corporación Sanitaria Parc Taulì. It provides information about the services offered by the institution, as well as health information for patients and professionals.

name: The Blog that Ate Manhattan
description: This site provides balanced, non-commercial health  information for women written by a gynecologist in New York  City, who also blogs about food and life in New York.

name: Transcultural Nursing Society
description: Official web site of the Global Transcultural Nursing Society (TCNS).  The society seeks to provide nurses and other healthcare  professionals with the knowledge base necessary to ensure cultural  competence in practice, education, research, and administration.

name: TCTMD-The comprehensive cardiology and interventional resource
description: TCTMD provides the most comprehensive on-line  educational resource in interventional cardiology and the  percutaneous treatment of cardiovascular disease.

name: Trouble déficit de l'attention Hyperactivité, TDAH France, Enfant hyperactif
description: Le site s'adresse essentiellement aux personnes concernées  par le TDAH (Trouble Déficit de l'Attention/Hyperactivité). Il  contient des informations sur le trouble et sur l'activité de  l'association de patients Hypersupers TDAH-France.

name: Terminland
description:
Mit der Online-Terminvereinbarung von Terminland können Patienten Termine bei Ärzten rund um die Uhr über das Internet selbst buchen, auch abends und am Wochenende. Dadurch ist die Terminvereinbarung unabhängig von Öffnungszeiten und telefonischer Erreichbarkeit der medizinischen Einrichtung möglich.

This web site provides a possibility for customers to make online appointments with healthcare providers.

name: Texas Cancer Center
description: This Texas Cancer Center is a guide to limited surgery in the treatment of cancer. It summarizes the medical research  supporting conservative treatment and provides direct links  to that research. Conservative surgery is further supported  by 'the cancer breakthrough you've never heard of' - small  numbers of cancer cells do not spread. This is true for the  original cancer and for any small recurrent cancer which  may appear following limited surgery.

name: Thalassaemia International Federation
description: This site provides information to patients/parents, health professionals and  all interested stakeholders about thalassaemia and other haemoglobin  disorders, their causes, symptoms, prevention, treatment and  management, epidemiology and medical advances, patients' associations, European and International relevant policies, and about the Thalassaemia  International Federation, its mission, objectives, activities and services as  well as the benefits for members.

name: American Chronic Pain Association
description: The ACPA web site offers programs and  services designed to provide support, encouragement,  information and coping skills that aid a person with pain  regain control of their life.

name: The Prostate Net
description: The mission of this website is to provide credible and  actionable information that will enable patients, their  families and health professionals to partner in making the  appropriate choices to assure the best chance for cure and  retention of the desired quality-of-life. Other Web sites and support addresses specialized on  prostate cancer are listed.

name: Thérapeutique Dermatologique
description: L'information proposée sur le site www.therapeutique-dermatologique.org est issue du livre de référence en dermatologie francophone  Thérapeutique Dermatologique . Par rapport à ce document, le site est mis à jour régulièrement par des médecins spécialistes (dermatologues) ce qui garantit que l'information proposée sur ce site constitue une référence tant sur le plan scientifique qu'éthique pour la peau et les maladies dermatologiques.

name: Pro Psychotherapie e.V.
description:
This site helps people to find a psychotherapist in Germany. In the database they can search for individual pages of psychotherapists with detailed information. There are 1000 therapists registered.
In addition, the site provides information related to psychotherapy. This includes an explanation of the different kinds of psychotherapy, answers to general questions about psychotherapy, links to self-help sources, education in psychotherapy and more.

name: Thermalisme Psychiatrique
description: Ce site contient des contenus publiés de sources de confiance  rédigés par le Docteur Olivier Dubois, Psychiatre et médecin  Thermal aux Thermes de Saujon. Les informations fournies sur ce  site sont destinées à faire connaître les résultats des études et  recherches en cours sur l'impact du thermalisme sur les affections  psychosomatiques et le sevrage médicamenteux.

name: Eau, Médecine Thermale & Psychiatrie
description: Ce blog a pour objectif d'évoquer ce qu'est la médecine thermale  principalement en psychiatrie, de définir les contours de cette  thérapeutique, de ses indications, de ses modes d'action. Ce blog a  aussi pour vocation de réfléchir au système de santé en psychiatrie  et aux bases essentielles qui sous-tendent les prises en charge  thérapeutiques et psychologiques des patients.

name: TheTurekClinic.com
description: An evidence-based, medical information website authored  by a recognized authority in the field of men's reproductive  health.

name: Three White Coats
description: This site provides a place where one can find science-backed and  thoroughly researched, yet succinct and easy-to-follow recommendations  for how to successfully self-manage one's conditions. Self-management  is a highly effective approach to dealing with chronic disorders that  focuses on useful information that empowers patients to play an active  role and partner up with their doctors in an effort to achieve optimal  health.

name: ThyCa: Thyroid Cancer Survivors' Association, Inc.
description: This site provides current information and free downloadable  publications about thyroid cancer and support services and  educational events available to people at any stage of any  type of thyroid cancer, as well as their caregivers.

name: Techniker Krankenkasse
description: This site provides information about the Techniker Krankenkasse, one of the biggest German health insurers. It features profound insights into medical and health related topics, i.e. descriptions of diseases, symptoms, diagnostics, therapy and curation. In addition, TK.de motivates the user to care more about his own health.

name: Dr Fady Rachid
description: The intention of this site is to provide information about the  treatments offered in my  private practice. Mainly, information on Repetitive Transcranial  Magnetic Stimulation  (rTMS) for the treatment of depression and auditory hallucinations.(a  new medical  treatment that has been recently approved by FDA). Clear, medically  supported data,  easy to read and understand, user-friendly to both doctors and  patients.

name: A Consequence of Hypoglycemia
description: This site provides personal stories of a person living with type  1 diabetes.

name: ToothIQ
description: ToothIQ  provides information about dental diagnoses and treatment  options. Information is presented in clear, easily understood articles,  designed to provide a framework for understanding dental topics.

name: Studio Medico Torrino
description:
Informazione sui servizi forniti dallo Studio Medico Torrino, di Medicina Generale Convenzionata e Specialistica. Il sito fornisce anche alcuni strumenti utili (calcolo di peso ideale, composizione corporea, rischio coronarico, regolo ostetrico), informazioni e links.

This site provides medical information for the general public (coronary risk, ideal weight, etc), as well as information about the services of the Studio Medico Torrino.

name: Translucenza.it
description:
This site provides all recent achievements on screening tests in the first trimester of pregnancy that can reduce the necessity of unselected access to invasive procedures such as amniocentesis.

Informazioni mediche sulla traslucenza nucale, un test di screening fetale non invasivo: spiegazioni sull'esame, perché eseguirlo, come e dove eseguirlo.

name: Transplantation verstehen
description:
Diese Website bietet umfangreiche und hochwertige Informationen über die Organtransplantation. Das Informationsangebot wird kontinuierlich erweitert. Regelmäßig werden mit Spezialthemen' verschiedene Aspekte der Organtransplantation detaillierter betrachtet. In Erfahrungsberichten beschreiben Transplantierte ihre Erlebnisse.

This website provides comprehensive information on organ transplantation and transplantation centers in Germany.

name: Transplant Living, Your Prescription for Transplant Information
description: TransplantLiving offers transplant candidates and  recipients practical and scientific resources relating to  organ transplantation--all of which are reliable and  constantly updated to keep patients informed.  TransplantLiving now features pre- and post-transplant  therapies and medication, a financial resources directory,  featuring links and contact information, feature articles  about nutrition and wellness, research, and emerging  trends in surgical techniques, products and therapies,  easy-to-use community outreach information and  opportunities, including a calendar of events and support  group meetings organized by state.

name: trauma-scope
description:
Este sitio web ofrece información sobre cirugía ortopédica, traumatología y otras especialidades relacionadas con el sistema locomotor humano.

This web site offers information about orthopaedic surgery, traumatology and other medical specialties related to the human locomotor system.

name: Travel health resource
description: Travel Health Resource is a source provider of  travel health information, products and resources. It is designed to meet the needs of venturous and corporate travelers, travel clinic patients and tour operator clients. Travel Health Resource is designed by our medical director, James Allen, MD PhD.

name: Travelsante
description:
Travelsante est un site d'information santé pour les voyageurs. Le site propose des fiches pratiques sur 316 destinations à travers le monde, contenant pour chacune d'elles, les vaccinations obligatoires, conseillées, l'hygiène et riques divers ainsi que des contacts utiles sur place (pharmacies, hôpitaux, consulat français).

Travelsante is an health information website for travellers. It provides health prevention information and health tips for many countries.

name: West Texas Cancer Surviviors Network - Phase 2
description: This site provides information about the West Texas  Cancer Survivors Network-Phase 2 (WTCSN-2) which is a  partnership between Texas Tech University Health  Sciences Center Department of Family and Community  Medicine & The Cancer Prevention and Research Institute  of Texas (CPRIT). WTCSN-2 is an initiative to enroll  cancer survivors in a network to provide cancer nutrition  information, enhance quality of life, and encourage healthy  habits for cancer survivors in west Texas. West Texas  Cancer Survivors Network -2 and community partners are  dedicated to providing cancer nutrition information to  cancer patients and the citizens of Texas. The purpose of  this website is to increase knowledge about cancer,  nutrition, & survivorship to cancer survivors and others. Our mission is connecting cancer survivors for better  health!

name: Endocrinology, metabolism and nutrition
description:
Un sitio que orienta sobre temas vinculados a patologías endocrinológicas y de la nutrición, dirigido a Médicos Clínicos, Endocrinólogos y de diversas especialidades, Egresados de Escuelas de Tecnología Médica, Enfermería y Público en General.

This is the website of three medical doctors, specialized in endocrinology and internal medicine respectively. Through their website they offer the general public with information about endocrinology, metabolism and nutrition.

name: Tuotromedico
description:
This site provides information about Health and well-being for all kind of people, organised in chapters such as nutrition, health and diet, surgery, men health, women health, senior health, allergy, cancer, etc. On-line frequently asked questions to health care professionals.

El sitio proporciona información sobre salud y bienestar para la audiencia en general, organizada en capítulos tales como: nutrición, salud y dieta, cirugía, salud del hombre, salud de la mujer, salud del adulto mayor, alergias, entre otros. Además la herramienta de preguntas frecuentes para profesionales de la salud.

name: UAUA.info
description: The site deals with all areas of Motherhood - from planning a  baby to adolescence. It includes materials for the health and  development of children from conception to adolescence,  materials about infertility, pre-conception and pregnancy  materials in psychology and education of children, child care,  adoption, legal issues, the materials on childbirth on maternity  Ukraine.

name: Unitat de Farmàcia Clínica i Farmacoteràpia
description:
Lloc web de la Unitat de Farmàcia Clínica i Farmacoteràpia de la Facultat de Farmàcia de la Universitat de Barcelona. Ofereix informació de projectes fets, publicacions, formació per a Farmàcia.

Web de la Unidad de Farmacia Clínica y Farmacoterapia de la Universidad de Barcelona. Ofrece información de proyectos realizados, publicaciones, formación sobre farmacia.

name: UILDM - Unione Italiana Lotta alla Distrofia Muscolare
description: This site provides social, medical and scientific information  about neuromuscular diseases. It addresses patients, relatives, operators  and general public. In it you can find: specific dossiers about the most  widespread neuromuscular diseases, in depth articles  about problems relating to these ones, interviews to expert  professionals, general information and research projects.

name: Université Libre de Bruxelles - Hôpital Erasme
description: Ce site est celui de l'Hôpital Erasme, hôpital académique de  l'Université  Libre de Bruxelles. Il propose une brève visite et détaille l'activité tant universitaire que de recherche, les services hospitaliers, les différents  services médicaux (anatomie pathologique, anesthesiologie,  réanimation, bactériologie, cardiologie) sans oublier les  coordonnées de  chaque département.

name: Gesundheitsseiten für Ulm, Neu-Ulm und Umgebung
description:
ulmer-aerzte.de hat sich zur Aufgabe gemacht, alle im Gesundheitsbereich tätigen, im Geltungsbereich ansässigen Anbieter aufzulisten und zur komfortablen Suche und Übersicht im Internet zu veröffentlichen. Es dient Interessierten zur schnellen und einfachen Auffindung des gewünschten Mediziners, Therapeuten, Spezialisten oder medizinischen Dienstleisters und wird über viele unterschiedliche Kriterien such- und filterfähig kostenlos zur Verfügung gestellt.

This web site serves for quick and easy discovery of physicians, therapists, specialists or medical service providers in Ulm and Neu-Ulm.

name: UNIBIO
description: Ce site contient une présentaiton générale et détaillée du groupement de laboratoire UNIBIO. Il presente aussi une partie adressée au patient, au professionnel et une présentaiton des services fournie par le groupement de laboratoire. Il permet un accès sécurisé et confidentiel au resultats d'examens pour les patient et profesisonnels.

name: Portal Unimed
description:
Portal Unimed offers Health services and information for the general public and provides the integration of Unimed System (medical co-operative) in the Internet.

O Portal Unimed oferece serviços de saúde e informação para o público em geral.

name: Portal Unimed Fesp
description:
This site provides health information for the general public and for medical professionals. Different areas of interest can be found.

No ar desde 25/01/2001 o Portal das Unimeds (www.unimeds.com.br) é a resposta a um desafio de integração estratégica, rápida e de baixo custo dentro de um sistema de organização e produção essencial à Unimed, capitaneado pela Fesp. Seu objetivo vem sendo conquistado e, cada vez mais, o Portal Unimeds passa a ser uma referência na Internet para o Sistema Unimed e para os visitantes e médicos de todo o País.

name: Pediatric Infectious Diseases and Immunodeficiencies Unit
description:
An open door to Pediatric Infectology for professionals and common users, as well as an opportunity for communication between all those who share the desire to help pediatric infectology and management of immunodeficiencies progress.

El sitio web brinda información para profesionales y publico en general e intercambio entre ambos.

name: UpToDate
description: UpToDate is a clinical decision support system that helps clinicians throughout the world provide the best patient care. The site uses current evidence to answer clinical questions quickly and easily at the point of care. This saves clinicians time, improves outcomes and lowers health care costs.

name: Cabinet d'urologie des docteurs Fiatte et Culvillier
description: Bienvenue sur le site web des docteurs Fiatte et Culvillier,  praticiens à la clinique Esquirol-saint Hilaire. Vous y  trouverez des informations pratiques, de la documentation  sur les différentes pathologies urologiques.

name: Chirurgie urologique
description:
Ce site contient des informations sur l'activité urologique du docteur François Grima, chirurgien urologue à Versailles et Saint Germain en Laye. Il expose, organe par organe, les différentes pathologies prises en charge et détaille de manière claire et adaptée, les possibilités de traitements, avec informations théoriques et pratiques.

This website provides information about urology.

name: Urology Consultant
description: This personal site provides information about a United Kingdom  urologist. It describes the surgical specialty of urology and gives patient guides on selected topics.

name: Urovirtual
description:
Portal de urología orientado a pacientes y profesionales de la salud. Ofrece las últimas noticias sobre avances en tratamientos, consejos y un servicio de directorio de especialistas.

Website about Urology. Specifi contents for patients and for professionals. Last news and description of technologies, suggestions, and a directory of specialists.

name: VaccinarSì
description:
This website presents medical and scientific information on vaccination. Edited by SITI - Italian Society of Hygiene, Preventive Medicine and Public health.

Questo sito web presenta informazione medica e scientifica sulle vaccinazioni. A cura della SITI - Società Italiana d'Igiene Medicina Preventiva e Sanità Pubblica.

name: Vaccines411
description: This site provides an extensive list of clinics offering  immunizations across Canada, along with reliable  Canadian-based information about a wide range of  vaccinations. The search of clinics is done by entering a  postal code and by selecting an age group/category.

name: Vaccines Today
description: Vaccines Today is an interactive online platform with news, blog posts and original interviews about vaccination issues. The tone of the news content is journalistic, but there are also several pages with background information on vaccine-preventable diseases and a glossary of medical terms.

name: VacciNewsNet
description: VacciNews.net provides up-to-date information to the public, media, health professionals and policy makers to help them understand the facts about vaccines and immunization. All information provided by VacciNews.net is reviewed to ensure that it is accurate and up-to-date.

name: Vaincre la Mucoviscidose
description:
Ce site est dédié à l'information et à l'action contre la mucoviscidose. Destiné au plus grand nombre avec une sections pour les patients et familles et une autre pour les professionnels.
This information site about mucoviscidosis is for patients and their families as well as for health professionals.

name: Vaincre le mélanome
description:
Ce site contient des informations sur l'association Vaincre le mélanome et ses activités, des informations scientifiques relatives au mélanome ainsi que des liens vers des sites médicaux, une partie permettant l'adhésion à l'association et le recueil de dons au profit de la recherche contre le mélanome, une partie permettant un échange entre patients et familles et aussi médecin.

This website provides information about the association and its activities.

name: Doctor Vakulenko: personal web site
description: This site provides general information about orthopaedic surgeon Anton  Vakulenko and about some most common diseases he is treating.

name: Groupe Français d'Etude des Vascularites (GFEV)
description:
Ce site est le site officiel du Groupe Français d'Etude des Vascularites (French Vasculitis Study Group), association loi 1901, présidé par le Pr. Loïc Guillevin à Paris, Hôpital Cochin, qui conduit des protocoles et études thérapeutiques prospectives dans le domaines des vascularites nécrosantes systémiques (périartérite noueuse, granulomatose de Wegener, syndrome de Churg-Strauss, micropolyangéite).

This website provides information related to the French Vasculitis Study Group and its activities.

name: Vasculitis Stichting
description:
Website Vasculitis Stichting which provides information concerning vasculitis.

Website van de Vasculitis Stichting welke informatie geeft over vasculitis.

name: Vaskulitis
description: Die Webseite bietet Vaskulitis-Betroffenen (Patienten und  Angehörigen) die Möglichkeit zur Information und im Forum zum  Austausch mit anderen Betroffenen.

name: Site officiel du Canton de Vaud // santé
description: Ce site contient toutes les informations de  santé émanant de l'Etat de vaud a destination des citoyens. Les informations de santé publiées sont destinées tant aux individus qu'aux professionnels.

name: Santé des Voyageurs
description:
Ces informations mises en ligne sur le site web du voyagiste sont des conseils sur les risques sanitaires rencontrés lors des voyages 'exotiques' ou non et les mesures préventives qui les minimisent. Le site comporte plusieurs volets:
- informations générales sur la santé des voyageurs, avant, pendant et après leur voyage.
- 'fiches-pays', adaptant les conseils à chaque destination.
- dernières informations-santé, actualisant et datant les risques récents, en particulier épidémiques

These information provided on a travel agency website are health and prevention advises for travelers. The site contains different pages:
- General information on traveler’s health, before, during and after travelling.
-“Country-files” for destination specific advises.
- Last health news regarding recent risks and epidemics.

name: Videoneurosurgery.com
description: The website goal is to show advanced neurosurgery techniques with high-quality videos (Flash and divx-HD quality). Each video is deeply analyzed with visual informations (texts, labels, arrows, ...) directly applied on the video frames. Being a new site (less than 1 week old) it was launched with 30 videos. More data will be added on a weekly/monthly base to make it one of the most valuable video-databases for the neurosurgery area.

name: vielgesundheit - Die MedizinMediathek
description: This site provides medical and health information about the austrian health  care system, shown in short videos and films.

name: Vingt huit jours
description: Site d'information actualisé de chirurgie gynécologique et  mammaire. Cancer du sein, pathologie gynécologique,  chirurgie miniinvasive, voies alternatives.

name: Viollier
description: The web site provides sense, value, philosophy as well as general  information of the organization and subsidiaries: team members, news  of laboratory medicine, statistics, jobs and services.

name: viomedo
description: Das Ziel von viomedo ist es, den Zugang zu medizinischem Fortschritt für  Betroffene deutlich zu verbessern. Mit unserer kostenlosen  Informationsplattform  zu klinischen Studien möchten wir erreichen, dass mehr Betroffene die  Möglichkeit  bekommen, von der Teilnahme an Studien zu profitieren.

name: Virologie pour tous
description: Ce site présente des informations sur les virus biologiques. Il devrait être accessible à tout public intéressé. Des panic_virus-300x278pages d'introduction  donnent quelques notions fondamentales qui devraient suffire à la compréhension du contenu des articles du blog qui s'ensuit. Ces notions générales,  Le Génome,  La Protéine,  La Membrane et La Cellule, accessibles  également à partir de la barre supérieure du menu, sont présentées de manière à ce que leur compréhension soit possible sans connaissance préalable de la biologie et de la biologie des virus. Les articles du blog vont présenter des sujets d'actualité ou non, au gré de l'auteur. L'onglet  commentaires  devrait servir non seulement à exprimer les degrés de frustration ou de satisfaction des lecteurs, mais permettre de poser des questions qui pourront déboucher sur le développement de nouveaux articles. L'auteur de ces articles

name: VirtualMedLibrary
description: VirtualMedLibrary's Mission Statement is two-fold. For Health care providers, VirtualMedLibrary aims to  deliver a multi-user interphase that allows you to  create, update, customize, retrieve and share your  medical resources online, in effect making  VirtualMedLibrary.com your virtual medical handbag, and  info exchange medium'.  Simultaneously, VirtualMedLibrary attempts to promote  the distribution of patient-friendly health information  to those who seek it. Every health care provider  maintaining their library with VirtualMedLibrary will be  encouraged to facilitate pertinent patient resources on  their home page.

name: Vistaláser Oftalmología
description: Este sitio provee información sobre los tratamientos que realizamos en las  clínicas Vistaláser Oftalmología

name: Vital Health Zone
description: Vital Health Zone will help you learn how better to take  care of yourself, from the inside out, from the food you eat,  the exercise you take and the lifestyle you lead.  Vital Health Zone will help you learn  all about nutrition,  vitamins, minerals, amino acids, supplements, food,  exercise, diet and how everything is tied together to make  you whole.

name: Vitanet
description:
Vitanet.de bietet viele Tipps rund um Ihre Gesundheit in Kooperation mit Partner- Apotheken. Schwerpunkte sind Diabetes, Herz-Kreislauf und Ernährung, außerdem gibt es News, Selbsttests, Foren und viele Infos für Medikamente.

Vitanet.de offers information on health with a focus on diabetes, cardiovascular and nutrition.

name: Viva magazine
description:
Ce site contient des informations destinées au grand public concernant la santé, la prévention, la santé publique et la protection sociale. Son objectif est de permettre au visiteur de mieux gérer sa santé et de comprendre l'environnement dans lequel il vit.

This website provides information about health, prevention and social protection.

name: Viva sem Tabaco
description:
This site provides a free and personalized online service for smokers who want to quit smoking.

Este site oferece a fumadores um serviço gratuito e personalizado para parar de fumar.

name: VLSP
description: Die Webseite informiert vorurteilsfrei über lesbische, schwule, bisexuelle und transgender Lebensweisen und wissenschaftliche Erkenntnisse zur sexuellen Orientierung. Sie richtet sich dabei an die interessierte Öffentlichkeit, ratsuchende Betroffene und psychologische/medizinische FachkollegInnen.

name: VoedingOnline
description: This site provides information about nutrition for dietitians, doctors,  pharmacists and other to food related professionals.

name: Dr. med. von Wahlert Frauenheilkunde und Psychotherapie
description:
Auf diesen Seiten finden Sie eine große Auswahl an externen Links zu den unterschiedlichsten Themen der Frauengesundheit.

This web site provides a wide selection of external links to various topics related to women's health.

name: VulvaKarzinom-SHG e.V. Homepage
description:
Die VulvaKarzinom-SHG e.V. möchte das Tabuthema Vulvakrebs in das Bewusstsein der Öffentlichkeit rücken und Betroffene, Angehörige sowie Interessierte mit Informationen, Hilfe und Beistand unterstützen. Selbsthilfe entsteht dann, wenn sie gebraucht und notwendig wird.

This web site is a patient support group for patients with vulva cancer.

name: Vulvodinia.info
description:
Association VulvodiniaPuntoInfo ONLUS is an Italian association established by healed women and composed also by members still suffering from vulvodynia, and they have already set in motion the process for the formal recognition of vulvodynia by the Italian Ministry of Health. Information on vulvodynia, including videos and a report you can download. You can also register to join their online forum, and they hold a list of healthcare professionals. VulvodiniaPuntoInfo have listed healthcare professionals on their database as a point of reference since 2010, and this list is completely and exclusively based on positive feedback from women. There is also a section on the forum in which some healthcare professionals correspond directly with patients ('Il Professionista risponde'). Their aims are to inform and educate medical professionals; to support women with vulvodynia and their families, by means of conferences, information days, conventions and meetings; to stimulate clinical research on vulvodynia; to create centres in all Italy which can cure women affected by vulvodynia; to have vulvodynia recognized by Italian NIH

Associazione VulvodiniaPuntoInfo ONLUS è un'associazione italiana a statuto di ONLUS fondata da donne guarite dalla vulvodinia e in via di guarigione. Ha iniziato il processo di riconoscimento della malattia in Italia a partire dal febbraio 2013 con il Ministero della Salute italiano. Fornisce informazione sulla vulvodinia, inclusi video e un report scaricabile dall'home page. E' possibile registrarsi al Forum dell'Associazione, che include una lista di professionisti esclusivamente basata sul feedback positivo delle pazienti. E' presente altresì una sezione in cui molti professionisti rispondono direttamente alle pazienti in Forum ('Il Professionista risponde'). Gli obiettivi dell'associazione sono di informare ed educare i professionisti sulla patologia, supportare le donne colpite da vulvodinia e le loro famiglie, attraverso tavole rotonde, open-days, conferenze, convegni e incontri; stimolare la ricerca sulla patologia, creare centri di cura in tutta Italia per curare le donne; far riconoscere la patologia dal Sistema Sanitario Nazionale Italiano.

name: Women Against Cervical Cancer (WACC)
description: WACC (Women Against Cervical Cancer) is an initiative  that aims to improve awareness of HPV and cervical  diseases, and to make cervical cancer prevention a top  priority on women's and public health agendas. WACC was created - and will continue to be guided - by  medical experts at the forefront of the field of cervical  cancer, who will call on the skills of others with expertise in  public health, education and project management to  progress its work.    The aims of WACC WACC aims to drive improvements in health education,  knowledge, informed choices and better health for women. It will help to solve the problem of lack of information and  understanding about cervical cancer, so women everywhere  can take steps to reduce their risk of developing this  devastating disease.

name: Boots WebMD
description: This site provides credible health information and in-depth reference material about health. It is a source of original and timely health information and also features material from well-known content providers like the British Medical Journal and NHS Choices.

name: WebMD Gateway
description: The WebMD network of sites helps individuals take an active  role in managing their  own health and wellness by providing relevant, timely and  objective lifestyle and  condition information that is developed by an award-winning  editorial staff which  includes medical writers and editors, physicians and health  educators. Interactive  services enable consumers to obtain in-depth information on a particular disease or  condition, research and plan for a healthy lifestyle goal, search  for relevant health  information across the web, and watch originally produced  videos. Unique features  on WebMD help consumers check symptoms, locate  physicians, assess personal  health status, receive e-newsletters and alerts, and participate  in online communities with peers and medical experts.

name: WebSurg - the online extensive surgical multimedia library
description:
WeBSurg a développé un concept innovant de e-training, e-learning, dédié aux chirurgiens spécialisés en chirurgie mini-invasive, accessible en plusieurs langues: français, anglais, espagnol, chinois, japonais et bientôt portugais. Chaque intervention chirurgicale est expliquée en détail par un expert dans l'université virtuelle, utilisant les potentialités du multimédia : graphisme animé, streaming video, interactivité. Site Internet en accès libre et gratuit. Services supplémentaires (vidéo haute définition, multiformat, live vidéo, mini-conférences, cas cliniques, avis et débats d'experts, bibliographies). WeBSurg et l'EACCME (European Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education), Institution de l'UEMS (Union Européenne des Médecins Spécialistes) sont partenaires et mettent à disposition des internautes chirurgiens des activités pédagogiques à distance accréditées.

Virtual university for continuing medical education and e-learning in minimal access surgery in English, French, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, and Portuguese soon: interactive encyclopedia, video footage, imaging studies, still and animated illustrations, experts interviews and debates, clinical cases, lectures. Free access to the website through a simple online registration process. WebSurg and the EACCME (European Accreditation Council for Continuing Medical Education), Institution of the EUMS (European Union of Medical Specialists) are partners in providing continuing medical education program activities.

name: R.A.A.I.D. Raising Awareness of Autoimmune Disease
description: R. A. A. I. D. is a medical, and educational information site that is  dedicated to Raising the Awareness of Auto-immune Diseases, by using  multimedia as a platform to reach others. They share knowledge about  these and other illnesses, and how they affect our society as a whole.

name: weisse liste
description: Die Weisse Liste unterstützt Nutzerinnen und Nutzer bei der Suche  nach einem Krankenhaus, Arzt oder Pflegeheim. Leicht verständliche  und übersichtliche Informationen helfen, eine Entscheidung zu treffen.  Das Internetportal ist nicht-kommerziell sowie kosten- und werbefrei.

name: Ordination Dr. Leopold Wiebogen
description:
Diese Webseite bietet Informationen über Gynäkologie, Geburtshilfe und Naturheilkunde.

This web site provides information on the private gynecological practice of Dr Wiebogen Leopold and their services.

name: Windsong Therapy
description: This site provides information and treatment methods for the fascial system of the body. It discusses the various conditions that may be affected by tightness and binding in the fascia. It also reveals how myofascial release integrated with other therapies may provide relief to sufferers of all ages.

name: 100000WelcomesWebPage Windsor URL
description: The 100000WelcomesWebPage Windsor URL is a virtual  learning and teaching environment that is dedicated to  the education and professional development of students of  mental health nursing and mental health nurses in  Northern Ireland.
keywords: learning and teaching in higher education

name: Women's Health Queensland Wide
description: The site provides quality information on a broad range of  women's health issues for women and health workers. The  information is balanced and independent of health care  provider interests.

name: World Allergy Organization
description: This site provides global resource in the field of allergy, advancing excellence in clinical care through education, research and training as a world-wide alliance of allergy and clinical immunology societies.

name: The XLH Network
description: This site provides information and support by and for people affected by a specific set of genetic disorders called 'familial hypophosphatemia', which can result in a form of rickets whose symptoms do not improve with standard vitamin D and sunshine. 'X- Linked Hypophosphatemia' is the more contemporary term replacing the less informative designation 'Vitamin D Resistant Rickets'.

name: Young Families Connect
description: The purpose of the Young Families Connect web site is to:     Assist both expectant and/or parenting women and men ages 13-24 years old. Young expectant and parenting women and men experience more life challenges than their peers and they and their children are often at high risk for poorer social, educational and health outcomes. Having a healthy pregnancy, staying in school finding employment, obtaining educational success and acquiring effective parenting skills are all critical to the success of parents and their children in our society.     The Young Families Connect: Engaging Communities project will leverage current resources in five high need communities by assisting existing providers serving young expectant parenting women and men in adopting evidence  based and evidence informed practices. The project will also bring resources to these communities to provide young families with supportive services identified through a community based needs assessment process. The overall goals of Young Families Connect: Engaging Communities are to 1) increase self-sufficiency, 2) improve health and wellness, and 3) improve parenting skills for expectant and parenting women and men ages 13- 24 years.

name: Young Womens Health
description:
The mission of the Center for Young Women's Health (CYWH) is to improve teen girls and young women's understanding of normal health and development, as well as of specific diseases and conditions, and to empower them to take an active role in their own health care.
Readers of YoungWomensHealth.org will find online health resources for teens, parents, and healthcare professionals and also information on medical services, special programs and research projects carried out by CYWH.

name: Your Health Link
description: The Your Health Link website acts as a clearinghouse or  gateway to reputable health organisations within Australia.   It has been developed by a Government Health Service and  links to websites that includes information on health and a  number of other organisations that influence a healthy  outcome.  The site is designed to make it easy for our  health consumers to access information to support their  health needs.  The website is overseen by an Advisory  Committee and governed by the Mid North Coast Local  Health District which is an organisation under NSW Health  jurisdiction Australia.

name: Zabi
description:
Der Zuckerkonsum steigt ständig. Dem sind insbesondere unsere Kinder hilflos ausgeliefert. Diese Seite soll darüber informieren und aufklären sowie zu einer gesunden Ernährung anleiten.

This web site aims to raise awareness of parents about health eating of their children with a special focus on sugar consumption.

name: Asociación Vasca de Geriatría y Gerontología Zahartzaroa
description: Web dedicada a promover el avance científico, la profesionalización y formación sobre el envejecimiento entre los profesionales de la salud.

name: Zahnarzt Marburg
description:
Diese Website beschreibt zahnmedizinische Behandlungsmethoden der Praxis Dr Jochum in Marburg. Sie bietet den Besuchern einen Blog sowie ein Forum zur Erörterung medizinischer Fragen.

This web site provides information about the private dental practice of Dr Jochum in Marburg and their services.

name: Joachim Frey, Zahnarzt
description: This site describes the practice and services of Joachim Frey, Dentist  in Wiesbaden, Germany.

name: Praxisgemeinschaft Dr. A. und D. Kuroszczyk
description:
Die Website beinhaltet Informationen zur Zahnarztpraxis, zum Team, zum Leistungsspektrum, zur Anfahrt etc.

This web site provides information on private dental practice in Mainz and their services.

name: ZithaKlinik
description: Ce site contient un panorama complet des services médicaux et de  l'offre de soins de la ZithaKlinik. Le site propose des renseignements  sur l'évolution de l'offre de soins de la clinique.

name: ZorgWijzer
description:
Zorgwijzer.nl is al 15 jaar een begrip in de zorg. De site helpt met het vinden van een geschikte zorgverzekering, maar biedt daarnaast ook klantbeoordelingen van verzekeraars en het laatste nieuws omtrent het zorgstelsel.

ZorgWijzer.nl informs on different topics and news regarding healthcare and healthcare insurance in the Netherlands. Moreover, visitors can compare their healthcare insurance based on several indicators, such as coverage, deductible excess and customer ratings.

name: Réseau National Alimentation Cancer Recherche (réseau NACRe)
description:
Le site internet du réseau NACRe a pour vocation : - d'informer ses partenaires et le grand public de l'état des connaissances des relations entre facteurs nutritionnels et cancers ; - d'informer ses partenaires et le grand public sur les équipes du réseau et leur activité de recherche ; - de faciliter la communication entre les équipes membres (informations sur la thématique nutrition et cancer, documents de travail). Il n'a pas vocation de promouvoir un traitement médical spécifique, un produit commercial ou un service.

This site provides information about the links between nutritional factors and cancer.

name: Xemio
description: Xemio nace para ayudar a las pacientes en tratamiento de cáncer de  mama desde su casa. Tiene dos vertientes, por un lado una social,  generando un entorno virtual de encuentro, debate, apoyo y soporte,  con noticias de actualidad. Y por otro lado el desarrollo de una  herramienta que proporcionará información y sencillas instrucciones  para identificar y actuar frente a la aparición de efectos adversos,  que se podrán guardar para la visita médica, y para proporcionar  datos para poder realizar investigación.

name: Raremark
description: This site provides families with the latest research and treatments in  development, and enables them to share their experience to help others.  It allows people affected by a rare disease to be heard by the people  developing new treatments.

name: Addiction Resource
description: This website provides a community for those recovering from addiction  and helps general public to find the information on substance abuse and  addiction. Our goal is to provide resources to help people struggling with  addictions and their loved ones to make the first step in reaching out for  help.

name: Advanced Medical Certification LLC
description: AdvancedMedicalCertification.com is your #1 online provider  of all your medical certification needs. We offer 100% online  certification and recertification courses in the following: ACLS (Advanced Cardiac Life Support) PALS (Pediatric Advanced Life Support) BLS (Basic Life Support)

name: Amaranto Terapia Ocupacional
description: Este sitio web provee de información profesional para  profesionales, pacientes y familiares sobre la Terapia  Ocupacional.

name: BluePages Depression Information
description: BluePages provides information on depression symptoms,  ratings of treatment effectiveness based on the scientific  evidence, depression help and resources, and a depression- specific search engine. BluePages was developed by the  Centre for Mental Health Research, The Australian National  University and CSIRO.

name: Dr Bron Urologue
description:
Ce site est le site web d'information du docteur Jacques Bron chirurgien urologue.

This site is the information website of Dr. Jacques Bron urological surgeon.

name: hablandodegeriatria,com
description: Este website es un blog organizado en 5 secciones alternantes,  relacionados todos ellos con la sanidad, y más concretamente con  el mundo de la geriatría.
